a3f1abf485.gt:
Mix the Italian seasoning with 1 tsp olive oil and rub over chicken.
Refrigerate for 4-24 hours.
In a saucepan over medium-low heat add the tomatoes, 2 tsp olive oil, 2 tsp balsamic vinegar, and seasoning as desired.
In a large pan bring 6 cups of water to a boil and cook the pasta according the package directions.
Allow the tomatoes to simmer for 20 minutes, then add the mixed veggies and continue to simmer for another 10 minutes (I used a frozen blend).
Grill the chicken until an internal temp of 165 F is reached (approx.
7 minutes per side).
Pour the tomatoes over the pasta and top with a chicken breast.

38747a5ef7.gt:
Prepare a large ice bath.
In a large saucepan of salted boiling water, blanch the cauliflower until just starting to soften, 1 to 2 minutes.
Drain and transfer to the ice bath to cool.
Drain again.
In a large saucepan, combine the vinegar with the water, sugar, curry powder and 1 tablespoon of salt and bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
Remove from the heat, stir in the cauliflower and let cool completely.
Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Drain the cauliflower; reserve the brine to pickle more vegetables, if desired.
Preheat the oven to 375.
On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the cauliflower with the olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Roast for about 35 minutes, stirring once or twice, until tender and browned in spots.
Transfer the cauliflower to a platter and serve.

To create a delicious Pickled and Roasted Cauliflower with Curry, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the cauliflower by washing it thoroughly and removing the stem and leaves. Cut the cauliflower into florets.
2. In a large bowl, mix together the cauliflower florets, curry powder, salt, and pepper. Toss the cauliflower to ensure even coating.
3. Spread the cauliflower evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Roast the cauliflower in a preheated oven at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and slightly browned.
4. While the cauliflower is roasting, prepare the pickling solution by combining vinegar, sugar, salt, and spices in a saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for 5-10 minutes, or until the pickling solution has thickened slightly.
5. Once the cauliflower is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool slightly. Then, pour the pickling solution over the cauliflower and toss to ensure even coating.
6. Cover the cauliflower with a clean kitchen towel and let it pickle in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight.
7. After the pickling time is up, remove the cauliflower from the pickling solution and let it drain in a colander.
8. Serve the Pickled and Roasted Cauliflower with Curry as a side dish or a main course, garnished with fresh cilantro and a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil.

Enjoy your delicious Pickled and Roasted Cauliflower with Curry!

3ca1d4e9d8.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Place onion, celery, and carrot in a large, shallow roasting pan.
Place turkey, breast side up, on top of the vegetables in the roasting pan.
Pat the outside and inside of the turkey dry with paper towels.
Combine salt, black pepper and cayenne pepper in a small bowl.
Season the inside of the turkey with about 1/3 of the salt mixture.
Fold wing tips under the bird.
Melt butter in small saucepan over medium heat until the edges begin to turn golden, about 2 minutes.
Cook and stir rosemary and sage for 1 minute.
Place rosemary and sage inside the cavity of the turkey; reserve melted butter.
Tie the legs together with twine.
Brush outside of the turkey completely with the melted butter.
Season with remaining 2/3 of the salt mixture.
Bake turkey, uncovered, in the preheated oven until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 3 hours.
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone should read 180 degrees F (82 degrees C).
Remove the turkey from the oven and allow to rest in a warm area 10 to 15 minutes before slicing.

To create a mouthwatering How to Cook a Turkey, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the turkey by removing the neck and giblets, and rinse it thoroughly under cold water.
2. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
3. Place the turkey breast side down on a roasting pan, and season it with salt, pepper, and any desired herbs or spices.
4. Place the turkey in the preheated oven, and cook for approximately 2-3 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. Remove the turkey from the oven, and let it rest for 20-30 minutes before carving.
6. While the turkey is cooking, prepare the stuffing by combining bread cubes, sausage, onion, celery, and any desired herbs or spices.
7. Stuff the turkey with the prepared stuffing, and place it back in the oven. Cook for an additional 30-45 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
8. Remove the turkey from the oven, let it rest for 20-30 minutes, and then carve it into slices.
9. Serve the turkey with your favorite side dishes, such as mashed potatoes, stuffing, cranberry sauce, or any other desired accompaniments.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

c6db02633a.gt:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.
Put the ricotta in a fine mesh strainer set over a bowl and let stand 10 minutes to remove the excess liquid.
Transfer the cheese to a bowl and add the eggs, salt and pepper, to taste and the orange zest.
Stir until well combined.
Transfer the mixture to an 8-ounce shallow baking and serving dish and put on a baking sheet.
Bake in the center of the oven until puffed and beginning to brown, about 35 minutes.
Remove from the oven and let stand 5 minutes before serving.
Serve warm with olives and baguette or your favorite bread and enjoy!
c6db02633a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, olive oil, salt, pepper, and minced garlic. Mix well.
3. Add the chopped olives and mix until well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish or a loaf pan.
5. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove the baked mixture from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Slice the baked mixture into desired portions and serve.

8d838c9253.gt:
Heat a Dutch oven over medium heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray.
Add celery, carrot, and onion to pan; cook 12 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add garlic; cook 30 seconds, stirring constantly.
Add broth and next 4 ingredients (through pepper); bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, and simmer 12 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Add chicken to pan; cook 3 minutes or until chicken is done.
Sprinkle with cheese.
8d838c9253.pred:
To prepare a delicious Chicken, Pasta, and Chickpea Stew, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- 1 pound of chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
- 1 cup of pasta (spaghetti, fettuccine, or your preferred type)
- 1 cup of chickpeas (drained and rinsed)
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 2 cups of chicken broth
- 1 cup of water
- 1/2 cup of olive oil
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Fresh herbs (parsley, thyme, or rosemary) for garnish

2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the chicken, cooking until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.
5. Add the chickpeas to the pot, and cook for a few minutes until they are heated through.
6. Pour in the chicken broth and water, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
7. Add the pasta to the pot, and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
8. Return the cooked chicken to the pot, and stir to combine all the ingredients.
9. Season the stew with salt and pepper, to taste.
10. Cover the pot, and transfer it to the preheated oven. Bake for about 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the pasta is tender.
11. Remove the pot from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Garnish the stew with fresh herbs, and serve it over a bed of cooked pasta. Enjoy your delicious Chicken, Pasta, and Chickpea Stew!

07d9e9cc9b.gt:
Combine water, sugar, salt, yeast, oil, and enough flour to make a soft dough.
(You may need more than 3 1/2 cups.)
Knead for 3-4 minutes.
On a greased counter, break off pieces of dough and roll into thin ropes that are about 1 1/2 times the length of your skewers.
Twist the rope around the skewer and place on a greased cookie sheet.
Repeat till all dough is used.
Let twists rise till doubled, about 30 minutes.
While they are baking, combine the glaze ingredients and let site while the bread twists bake so the flavors will blend.
Bake twists at 375F for about 12-15 minutes or till golden brown.
Remove from oven and brush with the butter glaze.
Try not to drool.

8ff16b99b6.gt:
Cream the butter and sugar
Beat in the egg
Add malt and beat together
Add the flour & salt if using and mix into a ball I changed to a spoon half way as mixture was going every where lol.
Put dough in the fridge for 30-60 minutes.
I left mine for 60.
This makes the dough easier to roll out.
10 minutes before you roll out the dough Pre heat oven to 150 & line a baking tray with greaseproof paper
Roll out the dough to the thickness of a 1 coin and cut out in rectangular shapes or squares,
Place on the tray and bake for 15-20 minutes until edges go lightly brown.
Mine took 18 minutes
Leave to cool a while on the tray before transferring to a cooling rack
Enjoy with a glass of milk or favourite brew.
8ff16b99b6.pred:
1. 1 cup of all-purpose flour
2. 1/2 cup of sugar
3. 1/2 cup of unsweetened cocoa powder
4. 1/2 cup of malted milk powder
5. 1/2 cup of milk
6. 1 egg
7. 1/2 teaspoon of baking powder
8. 1/2 teaspoon of salt
9. 1/2 cup of butter, melted

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, malted milk powder, milk, egg, baking powder, and salt. Mix until well combined.
3. Stir in the melted butter until the dough comes together.
4. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead it until it is smooth and elastic.
5. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a biscuit cutter or a round cookie cutter.
7. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the biscuits in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown on the edges and set in the middle.
9. Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Proper Malted Milk Biscuits!

8ffd977e2f.gt:
In 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, heat Italian sausages and 1/4 cup water to boiling.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Remove cover and cook until sausages are browned, about 15 minutes.
Remove sausages to cutting board.
When cool enough to handle, cut diagonally into 1/4-inch-thick slices.
While sausages are cooking, cut eggplant into 1/2-inch chunks.
In drippings remaining in skillet, over medium heat, cook eggplant and 2 tablespoons water until eggplant is tender, about 15 minutes, stirring often and adding additional water if necessary to keep eggplant from sticking.
Add spaghetti sauce and sausages; over high heat, heat to boiling.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, in saucepot, prepare ziti macaroni as label directs but do not use salt in water.
Drain ziti; return to saucepot.
Add spaghetti-sauce mixture; over medium heat, heat through.
To serve, spoon ziti into 8 individual pasta bowls or dinner plates; top each serving with some ricotta cheese and cracked pepper.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese if you like.
8ffd977e2f.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
3. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add sliced onions and cook until softened.
4. Add minced garlic and cook for an additional minute.
5. Add sliced sausage and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
6. Add sliced eggplant and cook until tender, stirring occasionally.
7. Add a can of crushed tomatoes and a splash of water, stirring to combine.
8. Season with salt, pepper, and herbs of your choice (e.g., basil, oregano, thyme).
9. Simmer the sauce for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it thickens slightly.
10. Drain the pasta and combine it with the sausage and eggplant sauce.
11. Transfer the pasta mixture to a large baking dish and top with grated Parmesan cheese.
12. Bake the pasta in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
13. Serve the Sausage and Eggplant Pasta hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

[/INST]

331c22eb1b.gt:
In a small Mason jar, or jar of choice, combine oats, chia seeds, ground flaxseeds, cinnamon, and sea salt.
Add milk and Greek yogurt.
Stir everything together and place the lid on the jar and give the mixture a good shake to combine the ingredients.
Place the lid back on the jar and refrigerate overnight.
In the morning, you can serve oats either right from the jar or in a bowl.
Simply serve with a sprinkle of sliced almonds, fresh blueberries, and some brown sugar, if desired (it is actually sweet enough if you use vanilla yogurt though!
).
331c22eb1b.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 1 cup rolled oats
- 1 cup blueberries
- 1/2 cup chia seeds
- 1/2 cup flax seeds
- 1/4 cup almond milk
- 1/4 cup honey
- 1/4 cup vanilla extract
- 1/4 cup almond butter
- Optional: 1/4 cup yogurt

2. Combine the ingredients:
- In a large mixing bowl, combine the rolled oats, blueberries, chia seeds, flax seeds, almond milk, honey, vanilla extract, and almond butter.
- If using yogurt, mix it in last.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate overnight.
4. In the morning, top the oats with additional blueberries and almond butter, if desired.

This delightful Blueberry Overnight Oats with Chia and Flax is a delicious and nutritious breakfast option that combines the natural sweetness of blueberries with the health benefits of chia and flax seeds. The almond milk adds a creamy texture, while the almond butter provides a rich, nutty flavor. The yogurt, if used, adds a tangy twist to the dish. This recipe is perfect for those who want a healthy, easy-to-prepare breakfast that can be enjoyed anytime of the day.

0998cbac3e.gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
In a large bowl, combine whole wheat flour, 1 cup white flour, brown sugar, baking powder and salt.
Using a pastry blender, or two knives scissors-fashion, cut butter into flour mixture until mixture resembles fine crumbs.
Add nuts or wheat berries.
Stir in the maple syrup and egg and just enough milk so that dough leaves side of bowl and forms a ball.
Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface; gently roll in flour to coat.
Knead lightly; if dough is very soft, roll in flour again.
Transfer to a lightly greased baking sheet.
Pat or roll into an 8-inch disk; cut into 8 wedges, but do not separate.
Bake until golden brown, about 20 minutes.
Immediately remove from baking sheet, and carefully separate.
Serve warm.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Cut in the cold butter using a pastry blender or your fingers until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Add the egg and milk, stirring until the dough comes together.
5. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead gently until it forms a smooth, elastic dough.
6. Pat the dough into a circle or square, and cut into desired scone shapes.
7. Place the scones on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the scones are golden brown and cooked through.
9. Remove from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

10a4bdfe37.gt:
Cook the wild rice according to the directions on the package.
Wild rice generally takes 55-60 minutes to cook.
While thats cooking, in a large soup pot, melt the butter and saute the leeks, carrots, celery, mushrooms, garlic and thyme on medium high heat.
Cook for about 15 minutes, or until the vegetables have softened, stirring occasionally.
Add the flour and stir until blended into the vegetables.
Add the chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Once boiling, cover, turn the heat down to low, and simmer for 30 minutes.
At the 30 minute point, add the wild rice, chives and cooked and diced chicken.
Stir in the cream, half-n-half and sherry.
Cook until thoroughly heated.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
10a4bdfe37.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine 2 cups of chicken broth, 1 cup of wild rice, and 1 cup of water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 45 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.

2. While the rice cooks, chop 2 cups of mixed vegetables (such as onions, celery, and carrots) into small pieces.

3. In a separate pan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped vegetables and cook for about 5 minutes, or until they are tender but not browned.

4. Add the cooked chicken to the pan, and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked.

5. Remove the chicken and vegetables from the pan, and set aside.

6. In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of cornstarch and 2 tablespoons of water. Stir the mixture into the pot with the cooked rice and vegetables. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the mixture thickens.

7. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

[/INST]

This delicious Minnesota Chicken Wild Rice Soup is a comforting and hearty meal that combines the flavors of chicken, wild rice, and a variety of vegetables. The soup is easy to make and can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

in large frying pan saute with olive oil - thinly sliced onion & thinly sliced garlic until lightly blanched.
add sausage & ground beef.
saute until sausage & beef are braised.
add some wine.
transfer to a large pan.
add halved cherry tomatoes & sliced zucchini.
saute until tomatoes begin to wrinkle.
add V8 & allow to reach a simmer.
add pesto, oregano & thyme.
reduce to level of a thin sauce.
add corn starch & thicken.
add more wine.
last add parsley & chives.
season with salt & fresh pepper.
reduce to sauce thickness (if it needs liquid add more white wine).
Allow to cool & refrigerate overnight for flavors to be infused in the sauce.
Serve over al dente pasta and top with grated romano cheese.

To create a delicious My Homemade Spaghetti Sauce, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly.
3. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Add diced onions and cook until softened.
5. Add a can of crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Stir well.
6. Simmer the sauce over low heat for about 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
7. Add a splash of red wine, if desired, and continue simmering for another 30 minutes.
8. Add a cup of water, if needed, to achieve the desired consistency.
9. Stir in a handful of chopped fresh basil and a pinch of sugar, if needed, for sweetness.
10. Serve the My Homemade Spaghetti Sauce over cooked spaghetti, and enjoy your delicious meal.

<</SYS>>

Ingredients:
- Olive oil
- Minced garlic
- Ground beef
- Diced onions
- A can of crushed tomatoes
- Tomato paste
- A pinch of salt and pepper
- A splash of red wine (optional)
- A cup of water (optional)
- A handful of chopped fresh basil
- A pinch of sugar (optional)
- Cooked spaghetti

By following these steps and using the appropriate ingredients, you can create a delicious homemade spaghetti sauce that will surely delight your taste buds.

68a1ebd22c.gt:
Combine flour, baking powder, sugar, cardamom and salt in a large bowl.
Whisk egg and water together in a small bowl.
Make a well in center of dry ingredients and add egg mixture.
Mix together gradually with a fork until mixture forms a soft dough.
If it's too sticky, add 1 or 2 tablespoons of flour (one at a time).
Cover dough with a wet towel or plastic wrap and leave 30 minutes or longer.
Heat 4 cups of oil in a deep, heavy pot (cast iron is preferable) until is reaches 360F
While oil is heating, roll dough out on a floured surface into a rectangle 1/2 inch thick.
Use a sharp knife to cut into 20 equal rectangles.
Fry maandazi in batches of 5, for about 5 minutes per batch, turning to brown both sides.
Hint: Turn the mandaazi before it gets too puffy, or the air bubbles will prevent you from turning it at all.
Remove from oil when both sides are golden brown.
Serve warm, dipped in powdered sugar if desired.
68a1ebd22c.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- Flour
- Milk
- Sugar
- Eggs
- Oil
- Salt
- Yeast
- Water
- Baking powder
- Vanilla extract

2. Preheat the oven:
- Set the oven temperature to 450°F (232°C)

3. Prepare the dough:
- In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, yeast, and salt.
- Add the milk, eggs, and oil, and mix until a smooth dough forms.
- Knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic.
- Cover the dough and let it rise for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.

4. Shape the dough:
- Once the dough has risen, punch it down to release any air bubbles.
- Divide the dough into 12-16 equal portions, depending on the size of the Maandazi you want to make.
- Shape each portion into a ball, and then flatten it slightly.

5. Bake the Maandazi:
- Place the shaped dough balls on a greased baking sheet or a silicone mat.
- Bake the Maandazi in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
- Remove the Maandazi from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

6. Prepare the filling:
- In a small mixing bowl, combine the sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
- Stir until the sugar is fully incorporated.

7. Assemble the Maandazi:
- Place a spoonful of the filling on the center of each cooled Maandazi.
- Fold the Maandazi over the filling, creating a half-moon shape.
- Seal the edges by pressing them together, and then roll the Maandazi to form a crescent shape.

8. Serve and enjoy:
- Serve the Maandazi warm, with a cup of tea or coffee.

3bcfc9dd72.gt:
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Drizzle olive oil on a rimmed baking sheet.
Spread spinach leaves in a thick layer covering the baking sheet.
Arrange onions and artichokes over the spinach, and drizzle the marinade from the jar over the entire salad.
Sprinkle with the cheese (and sausage, if you wish).
Bake for about 10 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted but NOT crispy.
3bcfc9dd72.pred:
1. Wash the spinach and artichokes thoroughly.
2. In a large bowl, combine the washed spinach and artichokes.
3. Add the minced garlic, grated Parmesan cheese, and chopped fresh parsley to the bowl.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
5. Pour the dressing over the spinach and artichokes, tossing to coat evenly.
6. Refrigerate the salad for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
7. Serve the salad immediately or chill it in the refrigerator for a few hours before serving.

7a39ad4f0a.gt:
In a large pot, combine the stock with the carrots, celery, onion, leek, potato, ginger, cumin, coriander, and cayenne, and bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer over low heat until the vegetables are tender, 20-25 minutes.
Working in batches, puree the soup in a food processor(or blender), then return to the pot.
Stir in buttermilk and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Reheat gently.
Ladle into bowls, and sprinkle with the parsley and serve.
Enjoy!

- Chop the carrots into small, even pieces.
- Cut the onion into small, even pieces.
- Cut the ginger into small, even pieces.
- Cut the chili pepper into small, even pieces.
- Wash and chop the cilantro.

2. Heat oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
3. Add the onion and ginger, and cook until the onion is softened and translucent.
4. Add the carrots, chili pepper, and cilantro. Cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until the carrots are tender.

80c8683fe0.gt:
To toast nuts, preheat oven to 375F (190C).
Spread nuts out on a baking sheet and bake until lightly toasted, about 5 minutes.
Nuts can be stored in the refrigerator.
Wash and separate endive into leaves.
Dry with a clean tea towel.
If not serving right away, place in a plastic bag and refrigerate for up to 1 day.
Whisk olive oil with vinegar, garlic, salt and pepper.
Taste and add more vinegar if needed.
Dressing can be left at room temperature for several hours or refrigerated in a sealed jar.
Vinaigrette becomes cloudy when cold.
When ready to serve, let vinaigrette come to room temperature.
Arrange endive on individual plates.
Shake vinaigrette and drizzle over salad.
Scatter toasted nuts over top.
Serve right away.
80c8683fe0.pred:
1. Wash the endive thoroughly and pat it dry with a paper towel.
2. Cut the endive into bite-sized pieces.
3. Toast the nuts in a dry skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until they are golden brown and fragrant.
4. In a large bowl, combine the endive, toasted nuts, and a drizzle of olive oil.
5. Season the salad with salt, pepper, and a pinch of sugar, if desired.
6. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.

[/INST]

ea6256f97c.gt:
Beat margarine or butter and granulated sugar in a medium mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium high speed until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, sour cream, and vanilla; beat until well combined.
Stir together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Add to butter sugar mixture; beat until combined.
Stir in raisins and 2/3 cup of fruit cake mix.
Spread batter evenly into a greased and floured 13x9x2-inch baking pan.
Stir together brown sugar, cinnamon, pecans, and 1/3 cup of fruit cake mix.
Sprinkle evenly over batter and pat down.
Bake in a 350F oven for 40 to 45 minutes or until toothpick inserted into center comes out clean.
Serve warm or cooled.

In a medium saucepan, bring 2 1/4 cups of water to a boil.
Add the rice and a generous pinch of salt.
Stir once, cover and simmer over low heat until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Remove from the heat and let steam, covered, for 20 minutes.
Fluff the rice with a fork and spread it out on a plate to cool slightly.

Add the rice and tea and cook over moderate heat, stirring gently, until the rice is hot and the tea is evenly distributed, about 2 minutes.
Gently fold in the crabmeat and cook until warmed through, about 2 minutes.
Season generously with pepper.
Transfer to a platter and garnish with sesame seeds.
Serve right away.

6eccb4afe2.gt:
Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat.
Drain pasta in a large colander over a bowl, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.
Rinse pasta under cold water; drain.
Drain tuna, reserving 2 tablespoons oil.
Grate 2 teaspoons rind from lemon; squeeze 3 tablespoons juice.
Combine reserved oil, rind, and juice in a large bowl; stir with a whisk.
Add pasta to oil mixture, tossing to coat.
Fold in tuna and apple.
Remove fronds from fennel bulb; finely chop fronds to measure 3 tablespoons.
Remove and discard stalks.
Thinly slice fennel bulb.
Stir fronds and sliced fennel into pasta mixture.
Add reserved pasta liquid and 1/2 teaspoon salt, tossing to coat pasta salad evenly.Sustainable Choice: Industry label regulations require solid white tuna to be from the albacore variety.

- Clean and chop the cucumber.
- Wash and chop the red onion.
- Wash and chop the basil.
- Wash and chop the parsley.
- Wash and chop the capers.
- Wash and chop the olives.

- In a separate pan, heat some oil over medium heat.
- Add the tuna pieces and cook until they are cooked through, about 3-4 minutes.

4. Prepare the dressing:
- In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and a pinch of sugar.

5. Combine the ingredients:
- In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, tuna, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, basil, parsley, capers, and olives.
- Toss the ingredients with the dressing, and season with additional salt and pepper if needed.

6. Serve and enjoy:
- Serve the Tuna-Fennel Pasta Salad immediately, and enjoy your delicious creation!

Cover and let it rest for 5 minutes.

Place in a bowl and add olive oil and a sprinkle of salt and pepper.
Wrap each piece of asparagus with prosciutto.
Place asparagus on grill set on medium heat.
Turn every couple of minutes until asparagus is fork tender, about 5 to 10 minutes.

8a7f317318.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 F. Spray a 9-inch glass pie plate with cooking spray or use a silicon pie plate.
In a 10-inch skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat.
Stir occasionally.
Drain.
Add salt, garlic powder and Cajun seasoning.
Spread in pie plate.
Sprinkle with cheese.
In a small bowl stir the Original Bisquick mix, milk, and eggs with a wire wish until blended.
Pour into pie plate.
Bake about 20-25 minutes or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean.
You can add to your slice ketchup, BBQ sauce, bacon or anything else you would normally top your cheeseburger with.

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground beef, onion, breadcrumbs, egg, salt, and pepper. Form the mixture into a patty.
3. Place the patty on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until cooked through.
4. While the beef is baking, prepare the pie crust by mixing the flour, butter, and water until the dough comes together. Roll out the dough and press it into a pie pan.
5. Remove the beef from the oven and let it cool slightly.
6. Once the beef is cool enough to handle, slice it into thin pieces.
7. Spread the beef slices evenly over the pie crust.
8. Pour the melted cheese over the beef slices.
9. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting and serving.

42aebc99ee.gt:
Chop strawberries.
Divide 260g (1 cup) vanilla yoghurt among four serving glasses.
Divide one-third of the strawberries among the glasses.
Sprinkle 2 tsp Milo over the strawberries in each glass.
Continue layering with 520g (2 cups) vanilla yoghurt, the remaining strawberries and 40g (1/3 cup) Milo.
Serve.
42aebc99ee.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup of Milo cereal, 1 cup of fresh strawberries, and 1/2 cup of milk.
3. Mix until the cereal is evenly coated with the milk and strawberries.
4. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cereal is golden brown and the mixture is bubbly.
6. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Meanwhile, prepare your sundae glasses with ice cream and toppings of your choice.
8. Once the cereal mixture has cooled slightly, spoon it onto the ice cream in the glasses.
9. Enjoy your Milo & Strawberry Sundaes!

The required ingredients for this recipe are Milo cereal, fresh strawberries, milk, and parchment paper.

ddf57796e4.gt:
Drain pineapple, reserving 1 cup of chunks, 1/2 cup juice (reserving juice for other purposes).
Combine 1/2 cup of the juice, ginger, soy sauce, cilantro and meat in bowl.
Cover bowl, marinate for 15 minutes.
In large, nonstick skillet, heat oil, add garlic, saute 30 seconds, until fragrant.
Remove the meat from the marinade, place in the skillet.
Stir fry 5 minutes, just until cooked through, remove the meat and keep warm.
Combine marinade and cornstarch in bowl.
Add the beans, chilies, pepper and marinade to skillet; stir fry 4 minutes (or until veggies are crisp tender and mixture is thickened).
Stir in 1 cup pineapple chunks, scallions and meat; heat through.
ddf57796e4.pred:
1. Pineapple (fresh or canned)
2. Beef (sliced)
3. Onion (sliced)
4. Bell Pepper (sliced)
5. Soy Sauce
6. Oyster Sauce
7. Garlic (minced)
8. Ginger (minced)
9. Vegetable oil (preferably sesame oil)
10. Salt and pepper

1. Preheat a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
2. Add the sliced onion and bell pepper to the pan and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until they are slightly softened.
3. Add the sliced beef to the pan and continue stir-frying for another 2-3 minutes, until the beef is browned and cooked through.
4. Add the pineapple (fresh or canned) to the pan and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes, until the pineapple is slightly softened and heated through.
5. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, oyster sauce, minced garlic, and minced ginger. Pour the sauce mixture over the beef and pineapple in the pan.
6. Stir the ingredients together until the sauce is well-coated with the meat and pineapple.
7. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Cook the stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the sauce has thickened and the ingredients are heated through.
9. Serve the Pineapple Beef Stir-Fry over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

7b0bd717e5.gt:
Soften the butter in the microwave and leave to cool slightly.
Sift the cake flour.
Separate the eggs.
Make meringue by whisking the egg whites, adding the sugar gradually until stiff peaks form.
In a separate bowl, beat the egg yolks and whisk in the melted butter a little at a time.
Then add the milk and the sifted flour, and mix gently.
Add in the meringue from Step 2 and carefully fold it in with a rubber spatula.
Cook in a waffle maker.
(I set my waffle maker to the medium setting and cooked for 3-4 minutes.)
NOTE: Increasing the sugar to 50 g will produce deliciously sweet waffles that are great even without a topping (however, they'll be soft and moist as opposed to crunchy).
Recipe Photo The waffle pictured was dusted with powdered sugar and served with lightly whipped fresh cream (100 ml heavy cream, 1 tablespoon sugar, vanilla essence) and pineapple.
7b0bd717e5.pred:
1. Preheat your waffle iron.
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the egg whites, sugar, and a pinch of salt until the egg whites are stiff and glossy.
3. Gently fold in the flour and baking powder until just combined.
4. Pour the batter onto the preheated waffle iron, using a ladle or a spoon to create evenly distributed batter.
5. Cook the waffles according to the waffle iron's instructions, usually around 2-3 minutes per side.
6. Once the waffles are cooked, remove them from the waffle iron and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. While the waffles are cooling, prepare the meringue. In a clean mixing bowl, whisk the egg whites until they are stiff and glossy. Gradually add the sugar, one tablespoon at a time, while continuing to whisk until the meringue is stiff and glossy.
8. Once the waffles are cool, carefully fold the meringue into the waffle batter.
9. Fold the batter gently but thoroughly, ensuring that the meringue is evenly distributed.
10. Cook the waffles according to the waffle iron's instructions, usually around 2-3 minutes per side.
11. Once the waffles are cooked, remove them from the waffle iron and let them cool for a few minutes.
12. Serve the Light Waffles Made with Meringue immediately, or store them in an airtight container for later use.

[/INST]

30ddae3add.gt:
Slice the sausage, clean the vegetables and slice the zucchini.
Other vegetables will work for this as well (some ideas are mushrooms, onions, peppers, or tomatoes).
Throw everything in the pot except the cream and Parmesan.
Bring to a boil as then simmer for about 10 minutes.
Stir frequently and check noodles for doneness at about 7 minutes.
Remove from heat once the noodles are done.
Any extra liquid is fine as the pasta will dry out after sitting for a minute or two.
Add the cream and Parmesan (you can add a couple tablespoons of olive oil instead of cream should you choose to).
Stir well.
Enjoy!
30ddae3add.pred:
1. Start by preheating your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large pot or oven-safe skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned and cooked through. Remove the sausage from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add some oil and cook the onion and garlic until softened.
4. Add the pasta to the pan and toss to coat with the sausage juices.
5. Pour in the marinara sauce and stir to combine.
6. Add the cooked sausage back into the pan and stir to combine.
7. Transfer the contents of the pan to a large oven-safe dish or casserole dish.
8. Add the grated cheese on top of the pasta mixture.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the delicious One Pot Sausage Pasta dish hot and enjoy!

[/INST]

lightly spray your 8x8 baking dish and add meat mixture to form an loaf.
bake uncovered about an hour or until thermometer reaches 170.

To cook Meatloaf Squared with the ingredients provided, follow these steps:

3. Shape the beef mixture into a square or rectangular shape, approximately 1-inch thick.

6b99a23505.gt:
Peel the bulb of garlic, which should equal around 10 cloves.
I prefer to mash it finely with a mortal and pestle (the old-fashioned way) but feel free to use a food processor.
Combine the salt and garlic cloves in whatever manner you choose, and grind them up well.
Then prepare the boxed mashed potatoes as directed for the smallest serving possible.
(Youll need about 1/2 cup.
2-3 servings on a box of mashed potatoes is about 1 cup.
So feel free to take out a spoon and eat the other half of the mashed potatoes.)
Let the mashed potatoes cool.
Go back to the garlic, and add the mayonnaise, the lemon juice and about half of the oil (about 1/4 of a cup).
Blend together in processor or blender.
Then add about 1/4 cup of the mashed potatoes and half of the oil you have left (about 1/8 of a cup).
Blend more.
(You may need to stick a spoon down in there to ensure that it mixes thoroughly).
Now add the remainder of your mashed potatoes and oil.
Give it a good final blend.
You may need to add more oil or potatoes, depending on whether you want it thicker or thinner.
Serve with pita bread, pita chips, chicken kabobs, or my Kafta (Kofta) recipe that Ive posted here in my recipe box.
Enjoy!
6b99a23505.pred:
To make a delicious Arabic Garlic Dip (Toum), follow these steps:
1. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat.
2. Add 3 cloves of minced garlic and cook until fragrant, stirring occasionally.
3. Add 1/2 cup of tahini and stir until smooth.
4. Gradually pour in 1 cup of water, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Add 1/4 cup of lemon juice, 1/4 cup of grated fresh garlic, and 1/4 cup of chopped parsley. Stir until well combined.
7. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Toum immediately, or store it in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

The key to a delicious Toum lies in the balance of flavors and the right amount of seasoning. Enjoy this rich and flavorful dip with pita chips, vegetables, or as a spread for sandwiches.

b9f129d26e.gt:
Heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat.
Add ham, green chiles, and mushrooms; saute 5 minutes.
Remove from pan.

dbf1079c1d.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F.
Lightly oil a 12-inch springform pan or 12 cups of a muffin tin.
In a small pot, combine the water, cinnamon stick and cloves and bring to a boil over medium heat.
Turn off the heat and let the spices steep for 15 minutes.
Strain.
In a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, whip the olive oil and brown sugar together until fluffy.
Add the spice water, petimezi, orange peel and tsipouro (or ouzo or grappa).
Mix well.
Dissolve the baking soda in the orange juice and stir into the petimezi mixture.
Sift 5 cups of flour into a medium bowl.
Gently whisk the flour into the petimezi mixture.
If the batter is loose, add a little more flour.
Stir in the chocolate chips, if using and scrape the batter into the springform or muffin cups.
Toss the granulated sugar and sesame seeds together and sprinkle over the cake.
Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 50 minutes for the cake, 40 to 45 minutes for the cupcakes.
Serve the cake as is, or with a bit of petimezi or chocolate syrup drizzled over or around it.
Serve the cupcakes, if making, the same way.
Petimezopita is delicious with vanilla ice cream, too.

To make Thai-Style Peanut Sauce, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of peanuts
- 1/2 cup of peanut butter

- 1/2 cup of coconut milk
- 1/2 cup of water

First, you will need to roast the peanuts in a dry skillet or oven until they are slightly browned and fragrant. Once the peanuts are roasted, transfer them to a food processor or blender and process until they are finely ground.

Once the sauce is to your liking, transfer it to a serving bowl and refrigerate it until it is ready to be used. You can use the Thai-Style Peanut Sauce as a dipping sauce for dumplings, spring rolls, or other dishes that you enjoy.

Here's a step-by-step guide to making Barbecued Asparagus:

4. While the asparagus is cooking, prepare the grilling or barbecue sauce.
5. Once the asparagus is cooked, remove them from the grill or barbecue and brush them with the prepared sauce.

Enjoy your delicious Barbecued Asparagus!

Pour milk into pint-size glass jar, and stir in kefir grains.
Cover jar with several layers of cheesecloth or paper towels, and secure with rubber band.
Store jar at room temperature out of direct sunlight and allow kefir to ferment until thickened.
(Healthy kefir grains will thicken milk in 24 hours, though this process may take as few as 12 hours in warmer temperatures, or as long as 48 hours in cooler temperatures.)
Check kefir periodically to gauge thickness.
When mixture reaches desired thickness, strain kefir into glass, stirring gently until only kefir grains remain in strainer.
(To keep kefir grains viable, stir into new batch of milk within 48 hours.)
Combine prepared kefir, orange juice, vanilla, and sugar in blender.
Pulse to combine.
Blend in ice cubes individually until as creamy and frothy as you like.
Taste, and blend in more sugar to sweeten as desired.

dc17b08e51.gt:
Combine first 8 ingredients in a food processor; process until smooth.
Add pepper.
Spoon 1 teaspoon of tapenade over each baguette slice.
Arrange on a serving platter; garnish with orange sections, if desired.

To prepare a delicious Croutons with Orange and Fennel Tapenade, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the crusty bread into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, toss the bread pieces with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
4. Spread the bread pieces evenly on a baking sheet, ensuring they are not overcrowded.
5. Bake the bread pieces in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy.

dfe6f1be35.gt:
Heat unsalted butter in a stainless steel, thick-bottomed sauce pan, over a low-medium flame.
Allow the oil (ghee) to separate from the milk solids.
Periodically remove the foam that accumulates at the top.
When the oil is clear in color, the ghee is done.
Remove from the stove and allow to cool for a while, than carefully pour off the ghee into a wide-mouthed jar through several layers of cheese cloth secured to the opening of the jar or through a fine mesh strainer.
Cover the jar and store at room temperature.
dfe6f1be35.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: To prepare ghee, you need to gather the following ingredients: unsalted butter, a saucepan, a heat-resistant spatula, and a clean, dry cloth.

2. Melt the butter: Place the saucepan on a heat-resistant surface and melt the butter over medium heat. Make sure to stir the butter continuously to prevent it from burning.

3. Skim off the foam: As the butter melts, a foam will form on the surface. Use the heat-resistant spatula to skim off the foam and discard it.

4. Continue melting: Once the foam has been removed, continue melting the butter until it reaches a golden-brown color and a smooth, creamy texture.

5. Test for doneness: Remove the saucepan from the heat and allow the ghee to cool slightly. Then, use the heat-resistant spatula to scoop out a small amount of the ghee. If it is clear and has a smooth texture, it is ready. If it is still cloudy or has a grainy texture, return the saucepan to the heat and continue melting until the desired texture is achieved.

6. Cool and store: Allow the ghee to cool completely before transferring it to a clean, dry jar or container. Store the ghee in a cool, dark place to prevent it from spoiling.

By following these key steps, you can successfully prepare a perfect batch of ghee.

e07fd8f60a.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350.
Set the squash on a large rimmed baking sheet, cut sides up, and brush with the 3 tablespoons of melted butter.
Sprinkle the sugar in the cavities and season the squash with salt and pepper.
Turn the squash over on the baking sheet and roast for about 1 hour, or until tender and browned at the edges.
Meanwhile, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter in a medium skillet.
Add the chestnuts and thyme sprigs and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until the chestnuts are lightly browned and glazed with the butter, 8 to 10 minutes.
Discard the thyme sprigs.
Cut each squash half into 4 wedges and arrange on a large platter.
Sprinkle with the glazed chestnuts and the red currants.
Drizzle the squash with the pomegranate molasses and serve.
e07fd8f60a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash the squash and chestnuts thoroughly.
3. Cut the squash in half lengthwise, and remove the seeds and pulp.
4. Place the squash halves cut-side down on a baking sheet.
5. Drizzle some olive oil over the squash halves, and season with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
6. Roast the squash in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the flesh is tender and the skin is slightly charred.
7. While the squash is roasting, prepare the chestnuts by washing them and removing the shells.
8. In a small bowl, mix the chestnuts with a little bit of olive oil, salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
9. Once the squash is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Carefully cut the squash in half lengthwise, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl.
11. Add the chestnut mixture to the squash, and mix well.
12. Add the pomegranate seeds to the mixture, and toss everything together.
13. Serve the Roasted Squash with Chestnuts and Pomegranate immediately, and enjoy the delicious and healthy dish!

98695d84fe.gt:
Heat broiler.
Using a sharp knife, lightly score eggplant flesh in a criss-cross pattern.
Arrange the eggplant skin side up in a single layer on a non-stick broiler pan.
Lightly brush with half the oil; broil 4 inches away from heat source for 3 minutes or until dimpled but not charred.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl combine soy sauce, sugar and mirin.
Turn eggplant slices over and brush with remaining oil; broil 1 minute.
Brush with soy sauce mixture; broil 1 more minute more until eggplant is tender when it's pierced with a knife.
Sprinkle with scallions before serving.
98695d84fe.pred:
1. Clean the eggplant by washing it thoroughly under cold water.
2. Cut the eggplant into evenly sized pieces, about 1-inch thick.
3. In a small bowl, mix together 1 tablespoon of soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of sugar, 1/2 teaspoon of minced garlic, and 1/4 teaspoon of grated ginger.
4. In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium heat.
5. Add the eggplant pieces to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are tender and slightly browned.
6. Pour the soy sauce mixture over the eggplant in the skillet, stirring to coat the eggplant evenly.
7. Reduce the heat to low and let the eggplant cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and the eggplant is cooked through.
8. Serve the Teriyaki Eggplant immediately, garnished with some chopped green onions if desired.

4782c93d83.gt:
In a large bowl, combine carrots, orange juice, raisins, ginger, salt and red pepper.
Toss to mix and cover.
Marinate in refrigerator at least 1 hour or up to 8.
To serve, halve avocados and remove pit.
Peel and slice into very thin slices.
Place a few avocado slices on each plate decoratively and top with carrot mixture.

8b231f2c0b.gt:
In a double boiler over medium heat, melt the butter and chocolate chips, whisking constantly until combined.
Whisk in the evaporated milk and powdered sugar and bring to a boil, stirring often, for 8 minutes.
Remove from heat and add vanilla.
Store in a glass container in the refrigerator.
Keeps for several weeks.
Makes approximately 3 cups.

1. In a saucepan, combine the sugar, cocoa powder, and cornstarch.
2. Add the milk, and stir until smooth.

9f7b08be0e.gt:
Preheat oven to 300 F. Line a baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment paper and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine oats, macadamia nuts, flax seed, wheat germ and salt.
Set aside.
In a small saucepan, combine brown sugar, honey and oil.
Cook over medium heat 2-3 minutes until sugar is dissolved.
Pour over the oat mixture, tossing gently to coat.
Bake for 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes, making sure not to burn the nuts.
Remove from the oven and let it cool.
Keep it flat and allow it to cool completely stirring a couple of times to break the mixture up.
Once cool, add the shredded coconut and the dried pineapple.
Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month.
*Notes: If you prefer your coconut toasted, feel free to add it to the oat mixture before it goes into the oven.
In this recipe, I kind of prefer it untoasted, but do whatever floats your boat!

combine chopped broccoli and chicken broth and bring to a boil.
cook until broccoli is tender.
in a separate pan saute onions in butter until translucent but not browned.
add this mixture to the broccoli and broth stirring in the flour.
cook until thickened.
add milk, cream, seasoning and cheese.
simmer until cheese melts, but do not boil before serving.

Combine 1 cup sugar and 1/2 cup margarine in large mixer bowl.
Beat at medium speed until creamy.
Add egg and vanilla, and continue beating until well mixed.
Reduce speed to low,and add all remaining cookie ingredients except marshmallows.
Beat until well mixed.
Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 6-7 minutes or until edges are just set.
Remove from oven.

Continue baking for 2 minutes or until marshmallow is softened.
Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets.
Cool completely.
Combine all frosting ingredients except milk in small mixer bowl.
Beat at low speed, adding enough milk for desired spreading consistency.
Frost cooled cookies, covering entire marshmallow.

904095d715.gt:

Add sliced mushrooms one handful at a time to saute pan.

Deglaze pan with cognac, scraping up any browned mushroom bits.
Add the chives.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.

To make a delicious Hot Fudge Sundae, follow these steps:

To prepare a delicious Bittersweet Chocolate Sauce, you will need the following ingredients:
1. 1 cup of unsweetened cocoa powder
2. 1 cup of heavy cream
3. 1/2 cup of granulated sugar
4. 1/4 cup of butter, melted
5. 1/4 teaspoon of vanilla extract

To make the sauce, start by melting the butter in a saucepan over low heat. Once the butter is melted, add the cocoa powder, sugar, and vanilla extract. Stir until smooth and well combined.

Next, add the heavy cream to the saucepan, stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming. Continue to stir until the sauce reaches the desired consistency, which is smooth and glossy.

If you would like to add extra flavor, you can add a pinch of ground cinnamon or nutmeg. Stir well to combine.

Once the sauce is ready, remove it from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes. This will help it thicken and set.

d3047450d6.gt:
Boil the water and pour a small amount in the teapot, swishing it around to warm the pot.
Combine the mint and green tea and sugar in the teapot, then fill it with the rest of the hot water.
Let the tea brew for three minutes.
Set out glasses for the tea.
A shot-glass is close to the slender glasses used in Morocco.
Fill just one glass with the tea, then pour it back in the pot.
Repeat.
This helps to dissolve and distribute the sugar.
Pour the tea.
You want a nice foam on the tea so always pour with the teapot a high distance above the glasses.
If you do not have at least a little foam on the top of the first glass, then pour it back into the teapot and try again until the tea starts to foam up nicely.
Garnish with the remaining sprigs of mint.

In a large nonstick skillet, combine mushrooms, chopped onions and 1/2 cup water.
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, until liquid has evaporated and vegetables are beginning to brown.
To deglaze, add 1/3 cup of the vegetable broth and stir to scrape any browned bits free from pan bottom.
Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables begin to brown again.
Repeat deglazing and browning steps 2 more times, using 1/3 cup broth each time.
Onion should be golden brown.
This should take about 15 to 20 minutes total.
Remove pan from heat.
In a large bowl, beat eggs to blend.
Stir in shredded zucchini, mushroom mixture, bread crumbs, cheese, pepper and oregano.
Turn into greased 9x13" baking dish, spreading out evenly.
Bake uncovered at 350 until casserole appears set in center when dish is gently shaken -- about 35 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes, then serve.

To make Korean Grilled Meat on Skewers (Bulgogi), you will need the following ingredients:
1. Marinated meat (beef, chicken, or pork)
2. Soy sauce
3. Sugar
4. Minced garlic
5. Ginger
6. Green onions (optional)
7. Skewers (preferably bamboo)
8. Cooking oil

First, marinate the meat in a mixture of soy sauce, sugar, minced garlic, and ginger. This will help tenderize the meat and give it a flavorful taste. Marinate the meat for at least 30 minutes, or overnight for the best results.

Next, heat a pan or grill over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan or grill, and cook the marinated meat until it is fully cooked through. This may take a few minutes, depending on the thickness of the meat.

While the meat is cooking, you can prepare the green onions (optional) by chopping them into thin strips.

Once the meat is fully cooked, remove it from the pan or grill and let it rest for a few minutes. Then, use the green onions to garnish the meat, if desired.

To assemble the skewers, thread the cooked meat onto the bamboo skewers, alternating with the green onions.

Grill the skewers over medium-high heat until the meat is cooked through and the green onions are slightly charred. This will take a few minutes, depending on the heat and the size of the skewers.

Serve the Korean Grilled Meat on Skewers (Bulgogi) immediately, and enjoy the delicious flavors and textures of this popular Korean dish.

To cook a delightful Garlic Bread, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together 4 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of salt, 1/2 teaspoon of black pepper, and 1/2 cup of unsalted butter.
3. Knead the dough until it comes together, then shape it into a ball and cover it with a damp cloth. Allow it to rest for about 30 minutes.
4. In the meantime, prepare the garlic bread by spreading 1/2 cup of softened butter on a baking sheet.
5. After the dough has rested, punch it down and roll it out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes, such as squares or rectangles.
7. Place the shaped dough on the prepared baking sheet.
8. Brush the tops of the dough with melted butter, then sprinkle with minced garlic.
9. Bake the garlic bread in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until golden brown.
10. Allow the garlic bread to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Garlic Bread!

ed226be03e.gt:
Heat oil in a small frying pan over low heat until hot, about 1 minute.
Add chile flakes and remove from heat.
Let cool to room temperature.
Strain through a fine mesh strainer if desired, then transfer to a container and cover until ready to use.
Heat half of a gas or charcoal grill to high (about 400 degrees F) and the other half to low (about 300 degrees F).
Divide dough in 1/2 and roll into 2 rounds about 1/4 inch thick and 10 inches in diameter.
Brush the top of 1 round with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Lay dough oiled side down on the hotter half of the grill and brush the top with oil and sprinkle with salt.
Grill without moving until grill marks form on the bottom of the dough, about 2 minutes.
Flip dough with a spatula or tongs to the cooler half of grill.
Spread 1/2 of the sauce evenly over the dough, sprinkle 1 tablespoon of the Parmesan cheese over the sauce, then top with 1/2 of the peppers, 1/2 of the sausage, and 1/2 of the mozzarella.
Cover and grill, rotating if necessary to avoid any hot spots, until dough is lightly charred and cheese is melted, about 8 to 10 minutes.
Transfer pizza to a cutting board, sprinkle 1 tablespoon more of the Parmesan over top, drizzle with desired amount of chile oil, slice, and serve.
Repeat with second round of dough and remaining toppings.

4. Add your roasted peppers and spicy sausages on top of the sauce.
5. Sprinkle grated cheese on top of the sausages and peppers.
6. Place the pizza in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Roasted Pepper and Spicy Sausage Grilled Pizza!

42ab84ef73.gt:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Thaw pastry according to directions on box (about 40 minutes).
Cut pastry into 3 sections along perforated lines.
Lay one section of pastry on a baking sheet to assemble.
Spread 2 tablespoons of pesto onto the pastry.
Next, space 5 shrimp evenly on top of the pesto.
Sprinkle with slivers of sundried tomatoes and pine nuts.
Using your fingers, fold over the sides of the pastry so they meet in the middle, and pinch to form a seal (although it will open while baking).
Bake one roll at a time, at 450 degrees F for 5 minutes, then lower oven heat to 375 degrees F and cook an additional 5-8 minutes until pastry is brown and puffed.
Repeat assembly and baking process with remaining two pastry sheets.
Slice each roll into five pieces (one shrimp in each piece) and serve warm.
Makes 15 appetizers.

Preheat your oven to 425 F. Line a rimmed baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment paper and set aside.
Place all the ingredients for the meatballs in a large bowl.
Using your clean hands, mix all of the ingredients until well combined.
(Kind of gross, but kind of fun.)
Cover and refrigerate the pork mixture for 20 minutes to allow the chia seeds to work their gelling magic.
Use your hands to mold the pork mixture into 1-inch meatballs, and arrange them on the prepared baking sheet, making sure they arent touching.
You should have approximately 20 meatballs.
Transfer the tray of meatballs to the oven and bake for 20 minutes or until lightly browned and cooked through.
In a small bowl, whisk together all of the ingredients for the glaze.
Pour the glaze into a large non-stick pan over medium heat and keep it warm until meatballs are done.
When hot, add the meatballs and toss to coat.
Serve meatballs warm over your stir-fried vegetables or noodles of your choice.

10. Oats

12. Ground black pepper

To make the Chia Seed Pork Meatballs with Spicy Ginger-Soy Glaze:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chia seeds, pork, ginger, soy sauce, spicy sauce, onions, garlic, egg, bread crumbs, oats, salt, pepper, and ground black pepper. Mix well to combine all the ingredients.

2. Form the mixture into small meatballs, approximately 1 inch in diameter.

3. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan, and cook the meatballs until they are browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.

4. Remove the meatballs from the pan and set aside.

5. In a small bowl, whisk together the spicy ginger-soy glaze ingredients.

6. Return the meatballs to the pan, and pour the glaze over them. Cook the meatballs in the glaze until they are fully cooked through and the glaze has thickened slightly, about 5-7 minutes.

7. Remove the meatballs from the pan and serve them over a bed of rice or noodles, garnished with fresh parsley.

Enjoy your delicious Chia Seed Pork Meatballs with Spicy Ginger-Soy Glaze!

In medium bowl, mix cocoa, sugar and oil.
Beat in the egg replacer; stir in vanilla.
Combine flour, baking powder and salt.
Stir into cocoa mixture.
Cover and chill 4 hours (or put in the freezer for about 30 minutes).
Preheat oven to 350.
Lightly grease cookie sheet.
Roll dough into 1-inch balls.
Using your finger, poke a hole into the ball and place 2 marshmallow pieces inside.
Form dough back into a ball, making sure marshmallow is completely covered; coat with powdered sugar.
Bake in preheated oven for 10-12 minutes.
Leave on cookie sheet for 1 minute and then transfer to a wire rack or brown paper.
EGG REPLACER 1 egg = 2 TBSP water + 1 TBSP oil + 2 tsp baking powder
Make sure you mix these together before adding to the recipe (dont just throw them all into the batter they must be mixed together first).

- 1 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1/2 cup of unsalted butter, softened
- 1/2 cup of granulated sugar

3. Add the milk, eggs, baking soda, and salt, mixing until smooth. Stir in the vanilla extract and white chocolate chips.
4. If desired, add chopped nuts and mini chocolate chips.

6. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are set but the centers are still soft. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Enjoy your delicious Hidden Treasure Cookies!

259241dc1b.gt:

Put the tuna in a serving bowl and mash with a fork until it's as mushy as you can get it.
Stir the reserved liquid, the salad dressing, honey mustard, relish, celery, carrot, sugar, and salt into the tuna.
Adjust seasoning to taste.

1. Tuna
2. Sweet Potato
3. Apples
4. Honey
5. Mayonnaise
6. Dijon Mustard
7. Salt and Pepper
8. Fresh Herbs (e.g. parsley, cilantro, or mint)
9. Crushed Red Pepper
10. Freshly ground black pepper

Ingredients:
- 4 cans of tuna (drained)
- 1 medium sweet potato, peeled and diced
- 1 medium apple, peeled and diced
- 1/2 cup honey
- 1/2 cup mayonnaise

- 1/2 teaspoon salt

- 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper
- 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
- 1/4 cup fresh herbs (e.g. parsley, cilantro, or mint)

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the tuna, sweet potato, apple, honey, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, salt, pepper, crushed red pepper, and fresh herbs. Mix well.
2. Add the black pepper and crushed red pepper, and mix again.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. Serve the Sweet Sweet Tuna Salad on a bed of lettuce or a sandwich, as desired.

a4c28c7c57.gt:
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the olive oil and after the oil is hot, stir in the eggplant.
Cook for 3-5 minutes, turning occasionally, until the eggplant is seared.
Stir in the onions, ginger and garlic, and then cook for about 1 minute, or until soft.
(If the pan is too dry from the eggplant absorbing all the oil, add a touch more olive oil when stirring in the onions.)
Reduce heat to low and stir in the coconut milk, fish sauce, curry powder, brown sugar, black pepper and optional chilies.
Simmer for about 2 minutes or until heated through and eggplant has absorbed some of the sauce.
a4c28c7c57.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Wash and peel the eggplant, and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
- Clean and chop the coconut, and extract the coconut milk from the grated coconut.
- Wash and chop the onions, garlic, and ginger.
- Wash and chop the tomatoes, and remove the seeds and membranes.
- Wash and chop the cilantro.
- Clean and chop the green chilies.
- Wash and chop the lemongrass.

2. Prepare the sauce:
- In a large pan or wok, heat oil over medium heat.
- Add the onions, garlic, and ginger, and cook until softened.
- Add the green chilies and lemongrass, and cook for a few seconds.
- Pour in the coconut milk, and stir to combine.
- Add the tomatoes, and cook until they are soft and mushy.
- Add the eggplant pieces, and cook for a few minutes until they are tender.
- Season the curry with salt, pepper, and any additional spices you prefer.

3. Cook the curry:
- Reduce the heat to low, and let the curry simmer for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
- Taste the curry, and adjust the seasoning as needed.
- Serve the Seared Eggplant and Coconut Milk Curry hot, garnished with cilantro.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and flavorful Seared Eggplant and Coconut Milk Curry.

8c7a346bad.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease a cookie sheet.
Unroll dough on lightly floured surface and press seams together.
Sprinkle one side of block of cream cheese with enough dill to cover.
Place cream cheese, dill side down, in center of dough.
Sprinkle with more dill to cover.
Bring sides of dough up around cheese block and seal to completely enclose.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for approximately 15 minutes.
Serve warm.
8c7a346bad.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- 1 package of cream cheese
- 1/2 cup of dill
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1/2 cup of sugar
- 1/4 cup of lemon juice
- 1/4 cup of mayonnaise
- 1/4 cup of chopped fresh dill
- Salt and pepper to taste

2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, lemon juice, and mayonnaise. Mix until smooth and creamy.
4. Add the chopped dill and mix well.
5. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
7. Place the dough shapes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the dough for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
9. Remove the baked dough from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Spread a thin layer of the cream cheese filling on top of each dough shape.
11. Roll the dough shapes around the filling, enclosing the filling completely.
12. Place the filled dough shapes back on the baking sheet and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the filling is bubbly and the dough is golden brown.
13. Remove the baked dill wrapped cream cheese from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
14. Serve the dill wrapped cream cheese immediately, or store it in the refrigerator for later.

Enjoy your delicious Dill Wrapped Cream Cheese!

af9fb785aa.gt:
Preheat oven to 275F/135C.
In a large bowl toss oatmeal, coconut, nuts, and sunflower seeds together.
In a separate bowl whisk together oil, honey, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Pour liquid mixture over oats and stir until everything is coated.
Pour mixture into a large rimmed baking sheet.
I also cover the baking sheet with baking paper but it's not necessary if you have a non-stick pan.
Bake for approximately 20-25 minutes, stirring once or twice.
Keep an eye on it so it doesn't burn.
Let it cool completely.
Blend in cornflakes if using.
Store in an airtight container.
af9fb785aa.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the rolled oats, almonds, and sunflower seeds.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the honey, oil, and vanilla extract.
4. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the granola is golden brown and crispy.
7. Remove the granola from the oven and let it cool completely.
8. Once the granola has cooled, transfer it to an airtight container and store it in a cool, dry place.

By following these key steps, you can create a delicious and nutritious Nutty Fruit Free Granola that can be enjoyed as a breakfast cereal, a snack, or even as a topping for yogurt or ice cream.

6f1343402a.gt:
Heat cumin seeds and mustard seed in hot dry skillet over high heat, swirling pan, until seeds start to pop.
Reduce heat to medium; add onions, chilies, and add a small amount of water; cook until onion is tender, adding more water as necessary to prevent sticking.
Add potatoes, ground cumin, coriander, turmeric, salt (to taste), and cayenne pepper, stirring to mix well.
Add 2/3 cup water, cover, reduce heat and cook for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until spices are absorbed and potatoes are tender.
Add a small amount of water at a time if all liquid evaporates.
Fold in cilantro just before serving.

6. Serve the Sookhi Bhaji hot, garnished with fresh cilantro and a drizzle of yogurt, if desired.

This recipe is a delicious and simple way to prepare Indian Potatoes with Mustard Seeds, using a combination of ingredients that create a rich and flavorful dish. The yogurt and mustard seeds add a unique taste to the dish, while the roasting process brings out the natural sweetness of the potatoes. The final result is a satisfying and appetizing dish that can be enjoyed as a side or main course.

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into evenly sized pieces.

- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1/4 cup of Dijon mustard
- 1/4 cup of chopped fresh parsley

f537025690.gt:
Mix chili sauce, lime juice, fish sauce, and cilantro; set aside.
Divide shrimp into 4 equal portions.
Lay each portion of shrimp in a neat row with tails pointed in the same direction.
Thread 2 thin wood or metal skewers (8 to 10 inches long) about 1 1/2 inches apart through center of each row of shrimp, pushing the shellfish close together.
Place shrimp on an oiled grill above a solid bed of hot coals or high heat on a gas barbecue (you can hold your hand at grill level only 2 to 3 seconds); close lid on gas grill.
Cook, turning once, until shrimp are pink, 2 to 3 minutes a side.
Brush tops of shrimp with the chili sauce mixture, turn over, and cook just until glaze bubbles and browns slightly, about 30 seconds (watch closely; glaze burns easily).
Brush tops with more chili mixture, then turn glaze down and cook just until it darkens slightly, about 30 seconds more.
Transfer shrimp to plates or a platter.
Season to taste with remaining chili mixture and juice from lime wedges.

- 1/4 cup of chopped onions
- 1/4 cup of chopped garlic
- Salt and pepper to taste

2. Prepare the skewers:
- Soak wooden skewers in water for at least 30 minutes to prevent them from burning during grilling.
- Cut the shrimp into bite-sized pieces.

3. Grill the skewers:
- Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
- Thread the shrimp pieces onto the skewers, alternating between shrimp and vegetables.
- Grill the skewers for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until the shrimp is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.

4. Serve and enjoy:
- Serve the grilled skewers with a dollop of sour cream, if desired.
- Enjoy the delicious Chili Glazed Shrimp Skewers!

Beat cream at moderately high speed until it holds soft peaks, 10 to 12 minutes.
Increase speed to high and beat until mixture separates into thick, pale-yellow butter and thin, liquid buttermilk, about 5 minutes more.
Strain mixture through colander into large bowl.
Using hands, vigorously knead butter in colander, squeezing out remaining buttermilk, until dense and creamy, about 5 minutes.
Transfer butter to large bowl, reserving buttermilk.
Using hands, knead salt into butter.
Roll into logs and wrap in plastic wrap or transfer to airtight container and refrigerate.
(Butter will keep up to 1 week refrigerated or 1 month frozen.)
Strain buttermilk through fine-mesh sieve, then cover and refrigerate up to 1 week.

).
Combine the garlic, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a medium bowl.

Garnish with sprigs of fresh mint just before serving.

To create a delicious Spiced Pepper-Crusted Filet Mignon with Asparagus dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Choose a high-quality filet mignon, cut into 4 equal portions.
- Select fresh asparagus, trim the ends, and cut into 1-inch pieces.
- Prepare a peppercorn and spice mixture, which can include ingredients like black pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, and cumin.
- Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).

2. Prepare the marinade:
- In a small bowl, mix together the peppercorn and spice mixture, olive oil, and a squeeze of lemon juice.
- Coat the filet mignon portions with the marinade, ensuring they are evenly covered.

3. Cook the filet mignon:
- Heat a skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil, and cook the marinated filet mignon portions until they are browned on both sides and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes per side.

4. Prepare the asparagus:
- While the filet mignon is cooking, place the asparagus on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil. Season with salt and pepper, and toss to coat evenly.

5. Assemble the dish:
- Once the filet mignon is cooked, remove it from the skillet or pan and let it rest for a few minutes.
- Meanwhile, cook the asparagus in the preheated oven for about 5-7 minutes, or until it is tender and slightly crispy around the edges.

6. Serve the dish:
- Place the cooked filet mignon on a serving platter, and arrange the cooked asparagus around it.
- Serve the Spiced Pepper-Crusted Filet Mignon with Asparagus dish immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

For this savory Pumpkin Butter, you will need the following ingredients:
1 cup of pumpkin puree
1/2 cup of unsalted butter, softened
1/2 cup of brown sugar
1/2 teaspoon of salt
1/4 teaspoon of ground black pepper
1/4 teaspoon of ground cinnamon
1/4 teaspoon of ground nutmeg
1/4 teaspoon of ground allspice
1/4 teaspoon of ground cloves
1/4 teaspoon of ground ginger
1/4 cup of heavy cream
1/4 cup of water
1/4 cup of apple cider vinegar
1/4 cup of honey

To make the Pumpkin Butter, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pumpkin puree, softened butter, brown sugar, salt, pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, cloves, and ginger. Mix until well combined.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the heavy cream, water, apple cider vinegar, and honey.
4. Pour the liquid mixture into the dry mixture and mix until smooth.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 30-40 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly jiggly.
6. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Using a spatula, carefully transfer the Pumpkin Butter to a clean bowl and let it cool completely.
8. Once cooled, store the Pumpkin Butter in the refrigerator, as it will thicken as it cools.

Enjoy your savory Pumpkin Butter on toast, crackers, or as a spread on sandwiches!

1432c540ac.gt:
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. In a bowl, whisk the canola oil, vinegar, miso, ginger, sesame oil, honey, lime zest, and lime juice until smooth.
Season with salt.
On a rimmed baking sheet, toss the tomatoes with 3 tablespoons of the miso dressing and season with salt.
Roast for 20 minutes, stirring, until the tomatoes are charred in spots.
Scrape into a large bowl.
Cook the soba noodles in boiling water just until al dente, 4 minutes.
Drain and cool the noodles under cold running water.
Add the soba noodles, scallions, and half of the remaining dressing to the tomatoes and toss well.
Season with salt, transfer to a platter, and garnish with the sesame seeds.
Serve with the remaining dressing.Looking for vegetable recipes?
Try our best asparagus recipes, eggplant recipes, or zucchini recipes.

1. In a large pot, bring 4 cups of water to a boil. Add 1 tablespoon of salt and 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
2. Add 1 cup of whole-grain soba noodles to the boiling water and cook according to the package instructions, usually around 3-5 minutes.
3. While the noodles are cooking, prepare the miso-roasted tomatoes. In a small bowl, mix 1/4 cup of miso paste, 1/4 cup of olive oil, 1/4 cup of soy sauce, 1/4 cup of grated ginger, and 1/4 cup of minced garlic.
4. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
5. Cut the cherry tomatoes in half and place them on a baking sheet. Drizzle the miso-roasted tomato mixture over the cherry tomatoes and toss to coat evenly.
6. Roast the tomatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are slightly caramelized and tender.
7. Once the noodles are cooked, drain them and rinse them with cold water to stop the cooking process.
8. In a large bowl, combine the cooked noodles, roasted tomatoes, and any remaining miso-roasted tomato mixture.
9. Serve the Soba Noodles with Miso-Roasted Tomatoes immediately, garnished with fresh herbs like cilantro or parsley if desired.

Combine all the cupcake ingredients in a bowl and mix until smooth.
If you want them to be more pink, add a bit of red food coloring.
Fill lined cupcake tin 2/3 of the way full.

Combine Frosting ingredients and beat until smooth.
When cupcakes are cooled, topped with frosting.

44b3907e95.pred:
To prepare a delicious batch of Think Pink Cherry Cupcakes, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners or grease the muffin tin with cooking spray.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups (360g) all-purpose flour
- 1 cup (240g) granulated sugar
- 1 cup (240g) unsalted butter, softened
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 cup (120g) milk
- 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 cup (60g) vanilla extract
- 1/2 cup (120g) cherry pie filling
- 1/2 cup (120g) milk

4. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, alternating between the flour mixture and milk, and mix until just combined.
5. Fill the prepared muffin tin with the batter, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
6. Bake the cupcakes for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cupcake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cupcakes to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Once the cupcakes are cooled, you can decorate them with pink frosting and cherries, as desired. Enjoy your delicious Think Pink Cherry Cupcakes!
