To prepare a delicious Greek Yogurt Bread, you will need the following ingredients:
1. Greek yogurt
2. Flour
3. Salt
4. Baking powder
5. Olive oil
6. Honey (optional)
7. Fresh herbs (optional)

First, combine the Greek yogurt and flour in a large mixing bowl. Add the salt, baking powder, and olive oil, and mix until the dough comes together. If the dough is too dry, you can add a bit of water to achieve the right consistency.

Next, incorporate the honey (if using) and fresh herbs (if desired) into the dough. Mix until the herbs are evenly distributed throughout the dough.

Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

Roll out the dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness. Transfer the rolled-out dough to the prepared baking sheet.

Bake the bread for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the bread is fully cooked through.

Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into your desired pieces.

Enjoy your delicious Greek Yogurt Bread!

<</SYS>>

In summary, to prepare a tasty Greek Yogurt Bread, you will need Greek yogurt, flour, salt, baking powder, olive oil, honey (optional), and fresh herbs (optional). Mix the ingredients together, roll out the dough, bake the bread, and let it cool before slicing it.

Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add onion and salt and stir until coated with oil.
Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is soft, about 10 minutes (if onion begins to burn after 5 minutes, reduce heat to low).
Add garlic and chili powder and cook, uncovered, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add beef and cook, breaking up meat with wooden spoon, until just pink, about 3 minutes.
Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper, brown sugar, tomato puree, ketchup, water, and hot sauce.
Simmer until Sloppy Joe sauce is slightly thicker than ketchup, 8 to 10 minutes.
Adjust seasonings.
Spoon meat mixture onto hamburger buns and serve.
Make Ahead: If you find yourself with leftover Sloppy Joes or just feel like making a double batch, the meat mixture freezes well for up to one month.
To return the meat mixture to its original consistency, you may need to add a little water when it is reheated.

To cook Japanese-style Sesame Dressing, follow these steps:
1. In a small bowl, mix together 1/2 cup of soy sauce, 1/4 cup of sugar, and 1/4 cup of vegetable oil.
2. In a separate bowl, mix together 1/2 cup of sesame seeds, 1/4 cup of white vinegar, and 1/4 cup of water.
3. Combine the soy sauce mixture and the sesame seed mixture in a small saucepan.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.
5. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and the sesame seeds are toasted.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Pour the sauce into a small serving bowl and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Japanese-style Sesame Dressing!

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients:
- 1 cup (237g) of all-purpose flour
- 1 cup (237g) of granulated sugar
- 1 cup (237g) of unsweetened cocoa powder
- 1/2 cup (118g) of unsalted butter, softened
- 1/2 cup (118g) of unsalted butter, melted
- 1 large egg
- 1 teaspoon of baking powder
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 cup (118g) of milk
- 1/2 cup (118g) of water
- 1/2 cup (118g) of chocolate chips

3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the melted butter and cocoa powder until smooth.
4. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Fold in the chocolate chips.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch (23cm x 23cm) baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
8. Allow the brownies to cool completely before cutting into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Grandma Woodall's Brownies!

6970e8f99b.gt:
Preheat oven to 300F and grease an 8x8 baking pan.
Combine unsweetened chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and melt over medium low heat, stirring constantly until pieces are almost melted.
Remove from the heat and stir until smooth.
In a large bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed, beat eggs until light yellow in color--about 5 minutes.
Add sugar and blend on low until thoroughly combined.
Add vanilla and melted chocolate to the egg sugar mixture.
Blend on low until smooth.
Add the flour and mix thoroughly.
Pour batter into greased pan.
Smooth surface with a spatula, and sprinkle uniformly with chocolate chips.
Bake on center rack of oven for 45-55 minutes.
The batter should be set and a toothpick inserted into the center should come out clean.
Do not overbake.
Cool to room temperature.
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour.
Cut and serve chilled.

65e738299c.gt:
Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large, heavy pot.
Saute the onion for a couple of minutes until softened but not browned.
Add the rice and saute for a minute or two until it turns slightly translucent.
Add the wine and stir until absorbed.
Next, add the broth one ladle at a time, stirring very frequently.
When the rice begins to dry out, add another ladle.
After about 15 minutes, begin to check the grains.
When the rice begins to break down but is still slightly tough inside, add the vegetables, basil, salt and pepper.
Add the last few ladles of veggie broth and work in the vegetables.
If youve run out of broth, use water and add salt, if needed.
Within 5 to 10 minutes, the rice will become tender and creamy.
Once the mix is thick and starchy, take it off of the heat and stir in the cheese.
Garnish with a bit more basil and more cheese, if desired.

1. Fresh vegetables, such as bell peppers, zucchini, and cherry tomatoes.
2. Fresh herbs, like basil, parsley, and cilantro.

4. Onions, either red or white, depending on your preference.

To create a mouthwatering Homemade Chocolate Mousse, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine 1 cup of heavy cream, 1/2 cup of granulated sugar, and 1/2 cup of unsweetened cocoa powder. Whisk until the sugar is fully dissolved.
2. Add 2 egg yolks to the mixture and whisk until combined.
3. In a small saucepan, heat 1 cup of milk over medium heat until it reaches a temperature of 115°F (46°C).
4. Gradually pour the hot milk into the bowl with the cream mixture, whisking constantly to prevent the mixture from curdling.
5. Place the bowl in the refrigerator and let the mixture chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.
6. Once the mixture has chilled, remove it from the refrigerator and use an electric mixer to whip the mixture until it reaches the desired consistency. This may take a few minutes.
7. Once the mousse is whipped to the desired consistency, transfer it to a serving dish and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Homemade Chocolate Mousse!
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

38c1babf26.gt:
In a small bowl combine graham cracker crumbs melted butter and 2 tablespoons of sugar.
After mixing well, press into the bottom of a cheesecake pan; set aside.
In a large bowl, combine room temperature cream cheese, eggs, vanilla, whipping cream and 1 cup sugar.
Beat until smooth and creamy.
Pour batter into the cheesecake pan and cook for 35 to 40 minutes at 350F.
If you like your cheesecake with a sour cream topping, remove from the oven after cooking, then combine 1 pint of sour cream, 2 tablespoons of sugar and 1 teaspoon of vanilla.
Spoon on top of the cheesecake and cook for 10 additional minutes at 420 degrees.
If I am adding fruit to the top of the cheesecake, I do not add the sour cream topping.
For chocolate cheesecake, add a bag of melted chocolate chips to the mixture and use chocolate cookie crumbs for the crust.
The vanilla can be substituted with any flavoring extract.
It is a very flexible basic recipe that can be changed to incorporate any favorite flavor.

In a bowl, grate the carrots and apple
Mix flour, baking soda, baking powerd , sugar , salt ,cinnamon and walnuts
Add the eggs, oil , milk ,vanilla extract
Add the carrots and apple
Spoon equal amount into the muffin tray
Bake for 20-30 min
b500700d75.pred:
1. Carrots
2. Flour
3. Eggs
4. Milk
5. Baking powder
6. Salt
7. Spices (cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves)
8. Sugar
9. Oil
10. Vanilla extract

To make Carrots muffin, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and milk together. Add the sugar and vanilla extract, and whisk until well combined.
4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined. Fold in the grated carrots.
5. Grease a muffin tin with oil, and fill each cup with the batter.
6. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Carrots muffin!

01483cc0de.gt:
Place the water and asparagus in a saucepan, and bring to a boil over medium heat.
Cook covered 5 minutes.
Remove cover and cook 1 or 2 minutes, until tender.
Drain and set aside, but keep warm.
Melt the margarine in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook the turkey cutlets 2 to 3 minutes on each side, or until browned and no longer pink on the inside.
Remove turkey from the pan and set aside.
Add the garlic and shrimp to the already heated skillet.
Cook over medium-high heat 1 or 2 minutes, stirring constantly until the shrimp is heated through.
Prepare hollandaise sauce according to package directions.
Place each turkey cutlet on a plate.
Top with the asparagus and shrimp.
Spoon hollandaise sauce over all.
01483cc0de.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the turkey with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs and spices.
3. Place the turkey in a roasting pan, and pour in enough water to come halfway up the turkey's sides.
4. Roast the turkey in the preheated oven for about 2-3 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. Remove the turkey from the oven, and let it rest for about 20-30 minutes before carving.
6. While the turkey is resting, prepare the gravy by pouring the pan juices into a saucepan, and whisking in flour to make a roux. Gradually add milk, and cook over medium heat until the gravy thickens. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Carve the turkey into slices, and serve with the gravy on the side.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
This guide provides a step-by-step process for cooking a delicious Turkey a la Oscar using the ingredients provided. The turkey is seasoned with salt, pepper, and herbs and spices, and then placed in a roasting pan with water. The turkey is roasted in the oven for 2-3 hours, until it reaches the desired internal temperature of 165°F (74°C). After resting, the turkey is carved into slices, and the gravy is prepared using the pan juices and flour. The gravy is then served alongside the turkey slices.
<</SYS>>

0121dfda05.gt:
Heat oil in large pot over medium-high heat.
Add shallots, ginger, and garlic and let cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
Stir in peanut butter, turmeric, cumin, and curry paste and let cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
Whisk in water, coconut milk, lime zest, brown sugar, and salt until combined.
Add tofu, sweet potato, and kale, and bring to a boil.
Let simmer, covered, for 30 minutes, or until sweet potatoes are fork tender.
Stir in lime juice and adjust seasoning to taste.
Garnish with cashews and serve over rice or quinoa.

1. Coconut milk
2. Bell peppers
3. Carrots
4. Onions
5. Basil leaves
6. Curry paste
7. Fish sauce
8. Palm sugar
9. Lime juice
10. Vegetable oil

To prepare the Vegetarian Panang Curry, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot or wok, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the curry paste and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
2. Add the onions, bell peppers, and carrots to the pot. Cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
3. Add the coconut milk, fish sauce, palm sugar, and lime juice to the pot. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the flavors have melded together and the vegetables are tender.
5. Add the basil leaves and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the basil leaves are slightly wilted.
6. Serve the Vegetarian Panang Curry over rice, noodles, or with your choice of side dish. Enjoy!

[/INST]

5b23053aa4.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine flours, Splenda, cocoa, and baking soda.
Add bananas, yogurt, egg whites, vanilla, and 1/2 cup walnuts.
Stir.
Coat a 9" x 13" cake pan with cooking spray.
Pour batter into pan, spreading evenly.
Bake about 35 minutes.
Cool.
Raise oven to 375F.
Toast remaining 1/4 cup walnuts 6 minutes.
To make frosting, pour 1/4 cup milk into a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in Splenda, cocoa, and cornstarch.
Slowly add remaining 3/4 cup milk and bring to a low boil, stirring continuously until thick.
Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla.
Cool and spread over cake.
Sprinkle walnuts over cake.

[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients:
- 1 cup (200g) all-purpose flour
- 1 cup (200g) granulated sugar
- 1/2 cup (120g) unsweetened cocoa powder
- 1/2 cup (120g) unsalted butter, softened
- 1 large egg
- 1/2 cup (120g) milk
- 1/2 cup (120g) mashed ripe bananas
- 1/2 cup (120g) chopped walnuts
- 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
- 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
3. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, alternating between the flour and the milk, and mix until just combined.
4. Fold in the chopped walnuts and mix until just combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
6. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
8. Once the cake is completely cooled, you can serve it as is or dust it with powdered sugar, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate-Banana Cake with Walnuts!

8fdec3f08f.gt:
Bring a saucepan of water to the boil, begin to cook the spaghetti
Prepare the topping.
Finely slice garlic, cut red pepper into thin strips, cut olives in half, cut crab sticks into cubes, slice salmon into small slices.
Shallow fry garlic, red pepper and olives until softened.
Add the crab sticks, salmon and shrimps and cook until it's pretty much there.
Throw in a dash of white wine and a dash of lemon juice.
Season to taste with salt, pepper, basil.
Drain spaghetti and combine with topping.
Generously slash it with olive oil.
Boom.

5. Add the garlic and red pepper flakes, and sauté for a few seconds until fragrant.
6. Add the shrimp to the skillet, and cook until they are pink and fully cooked through.
7. Add the cherry tomatoes to the skillet, and cook until they start to release their juices.
8. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet, and stir to combine.
9. Add the grated Parmesan cheese, and stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is creamy.
10. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Serve the Budget Seafood Pasta immediately, and enjoy!

669da1896f.gt:
Peel the pears, cut them into quarters and remove the cores.
Cut each quarter in half and put them in a bowl.
Shave the cheese with a vegetable peeler and mix three-quarters of it with the pears.
Beat the oil and the lemon juice together and add salt and pepper to taste.
Spoon about half this dressing over the pears and leave for 1 hour.
Spoon the pears into a deep dish and shower with the remaining cheese.
Surround with the rocket and drizzle the rest of the dressing over it.
Serve immediately.
Serves 4.

To make AMIEs PEAR and CHEESE SALAD, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of pears, peeled and chopped
- 1 cup of grated cheese (such as cheddar or gouda)
- 1/2 cup of mayonnaise
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1/4 cup of honey
- 1/4 cup of lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Optional: 1/4 cup of chopped walnuts or pecans

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped pears, grated cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, honey, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Mix well to ensure the ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. If desired, add the chopped walnuts or pecans to the mixture.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the pears are tender and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
5. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Serve the AMIEs PEAR and CHEESE SALAD immediately, or refrigerate it for later.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy salad!

dde6859b7c.gt:

Brown turkey in a nonstick skillet over medium high heat.
After about 7 minutes, drain the liquid off and return the meat to the pan.
Cook another 3 to 5 minutes or until browned.
Drain and set aside.
2.
Add bell pepper, mushrooms, and onion to the skillet and cook about 3 minutes.
The onions and/or mushrooms should be softened.
Add the garlic and cumin; cook another minute.
3.
Add the turkey back to the veggies, then stir in the BBQ sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce.
Cook, stirring often, until heated through (about 5 minutes).
4.
Spoon mixture into hollowed out rolls (makes it a bit less messy) and serve with your favorite baked chips!

1. In a large pot, combine 2 cups of rice, 3 cups of water, and 1 cup of peas.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot.
3. Cook for about 20 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the peas are cooked through.
4. Fluff the rice and peas with a fork, and serve immediately.

This dish is a simple yet delicious combination of rice and peas, which can be enjoyed as a main course or a side dish. The ingredients are easily accessible and can be found in most households. The cooking method involves boiling the rice and peas together, which allows the flavors to meld and create a satisfying and comforting meal.

646d990717.gt:
Cut the chicken breast into thin slices.
Soak dried shiitake mushrooms in lukewarm water until soft.
Cut off hard stems and cut in halves.
Cut onion into thin slices.
Chop cilantro.
In a large skillet with a lid, mix all the simmering sauce ingredients and bring to a boil.
Add chicken, mushrooms and onion and cook over medium heat for 3 to 4 minutes, or until chicken is done and onion is tender.
Beat eggs in a small bowl, then pour over the chicken and cover with a lid.
Cook until the egg is set, about 1 minute on low heat.
Sprinkle cilantro on top.
To serve: put about 1 1/4 cup of rice in a large, deep bowl and gently lay 1/4 of the chicken and egg mixture on top.
Pour simmering sauce over and serve immediately.

To create a mouthwatering Chicken and Egg on Rice (Oyako Donburi), follow these steps:
1. Cook rice according to the package instructions, using chicken broth or water as the base.
2. While the rice is cooking, prepare the chicken by marinating it in a mixture of soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
3. Once the rice is cooked, let it cool for a few minutes.
4. In a separate pan, cook the eggs until they are fully cooked and set.
5. To assemble the dish, place the cooked rice in a bowl or on a plate.
6. Slice the cooked chicken and place it on top of the rice.
7. Carefully crack the cooked eggs on top of the chicken, making sure not to break the yolks.
8. Garnish with chopped green onions and serve immediately.

Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Fry mustard seeds in oil until they begin to pop.
Add red pepper flakes and shallot and saute until shallot is soft.
Add garbanzos, turmeric, cumin, ginger, salt and enough water to prevent sticking.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Sprinkle with cilantro and serve.

To prepare Curried Garbanzo Beans (Chickpeas), you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of chickpeas
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup of curry powder
- 1/2 cup of water
- 1/4 cup of vegetable oil
- 1/4 cup of tomato paste
- 1/4 cup of lemon juice
- 1/4 cup of honey
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Optional: 1/4 cup of chopped fresh cilantro or parsley

Here are the detailed cooking instructions:
1. Rinse the chickpeas and drain them well.
2. In a large pot or saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the curry powder and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the water and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the chickpeas are tender but still slightly crunchy.
5. Add the tomato paste, lemon juice, honey, salt, and pepper. Stir well to combine.
6. Simmer for another 5-10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
7. If desired, add the chopped cilantro or parsley and stir to combine.

Enjoy your delicious Curried Garbanzo Beans (Chickpeas)!

e827f8e8c3.gt:
In a medium bowl, combine the soy sauce, dark soy and cornstarch.
Whisk to blend well, and add the chicken to the sauce.
Toss to evenly coat the chicken and set aside for 15 to 20 minutes.
In a medium bowl, combine the ketchup, stock, chili garlic sauce and sugar.
Stir to combine and set aside until ready to use.
Place a wok over high heat and add the vegetable oil to the pan.
Swirl the wok to be sure to coat well with the oil.
Add the ginger, garlic, green onions, dried chilies and jalapenos to the wok.
Cook, stirring often until the garlic is fragrant and the chilies begin to brown, about 20 to 30 seconds.
Add the chicken, bell peppers and onions to the pan and stir-fry until the chicken is no longer pink, about 4 to 5 minutes.
Add the sauce to the pan and bring to a boil, being sure to toss well in order to coat all the chicken and vegetables evenly, about 1 to 2 minutes.
Sprinkle the sesame seeds, sesame oil and cilantro into the pan and toss to combine.
Remove from the heat and serve on a platter with steamed white rice.

To cook Sichuan Pepper Chicken, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the chicken pieces, cornstarch, and a pinch of salt.
3. Heat some oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and ginger, and cook until fragrant.
4. Add the chicken pieces to the wok, and cook until they are browned on all sides.
5. Add the Sichuan peppercorns, chili pepper, and a splash of soy sauce to the wok. Cook for about 2 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
6. Transfer the chicken to a baking dish, and pour the sauce over the top.
7. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
8. Serve the Sichuan Pepper Chicken hot, garnished with chopped green onions if desired.

903a5e2cd4.gt:
Pop Trader Joe's frozen brown rice in the microwave, or make a batch of rice the traditional way.
While rice is cooking, make the dressing by whisking together half of the chopped garlic, tahini, lemon zest, lemon juice, and 3 tbs.
olive oil.
Add the hot water to thin a bit, and then 2 teaspoons salt.
Set aside.
Add 3 tbs.
olive oil to a big skillet over medium-high heat, swirling to coat the pan.
Be sure the chickpeas are completely dry, or they'll spit at you during this next step!
Add the chickpeas and a sprinkling of salt.
Let the beans saute for a couple minutes, until they get a toasty little crust on them.
Add remaining garlic and onions.
Stir for a minute.
Stir in the asparagus with another pinch or two of salt, then cover with a lid for a minute to steam until the asparagus softens a touch.
Uncover and stir in the rice and almond slivers, reserving a few almonds for garnish.
Adjust seasonings, adding more salt if needed.
Serve family-style in a big bowl drizzled with a few tablespoons of the tahini dressing, letting each person add more dressing to their tastes.
Watch as this magical concoction disappears before your eyes!

1690800ec2.gt:
Peel and quarter the potatoes, then wash them thoroughly.
Place the potatoes in a large pot with enough cold, salted water to cover them and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 min, or until cooked through, and drain.
Meanwhile put butter, lemon and garlic in a saucepan over very, very low.
Let it simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Discard lemon and garlic.
When potatoes are done, drain and mashed to your liking.
Fold in avocado and butter.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
If you like creamer mashed potatoes, you can add some milk.

To make Avocado Mashed Potatoes, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 2 avocados
- 2 medium-sized potatoes
- 1/2 cup milk
- 1/2 cup sour cream
- 1/2 cup mayonnaise
- 1/4 cup lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste
2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. Cut the avocados in half and remove the pit. Mash the avocado flesh with a fork or a potato masher.
4. In a large bowl, combine the mashed avocado, milk, sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
5. In a separate bowl, boil the potatoes until they are tender. Drain and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Mash the potatoes with a fork or a potato masher.
7. Add the mashed potatoes to the avocado mixture and stir to combine.
8. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and smooth the top.
9. Bake the Avocado Mashed Potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and fully cooked.
10. Serve the Avocado Mashed Potatoes hot.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

606b8ac522.gt:
Cut mars bars in 1cm thick slices, and place in a pyrex bowl.
Set the bow over a pot off boiling water and allow the chocolate to melt.
The nugget and caramel will take longer to melt then the chocolate, so stir vigorously until all the lumps have melted.
Remove from the heat, add the wipped cream and stir well.
You can add a little milk if the consistency is too thick.
Serve over ice cream.
Add a tot of brandy if you want hot chocolate brandy.
(Great for a cold day)

To create a mouthwatering Hot chocolate Mars sauce with ice-cream, follow these steps:
1. In a saucepan, combine 1 cup of milk, 2 tablespoons of cocoa powder, 1/2 cup of sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt.
2. Whisk the ingredients together until the sugar is fully dissolved.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.
4. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in 1/2 cup of heavy cream.
6. Stir until the cream is fully incorporated and the sauce has thickened.
7. Pour the hot chocolate sauce into a mug or a glass.
8. Add a scoop of ice-cream to the mug or glass.
9. Stir the ice-cream and sauce together until the ice-cream is fully melted and the sauce is smooth.
10. Enjoy your delicious Hot chocolate Mars sauce with ice-cream.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

3a699000d0.gt:
Cut bread into 1/2 - 3/4 inch cubes.
Rub serving dish with garlic and add bread cubes.
Mix cornstarch and brandy together.
Heat wine until it starts to boil.
The add grated cheeses, stirring constantly until the cheese has melted.
DO NOT BOIL.
Add the cornstarch mixture to the melted cheese, stirring until it is a cream consistency.
Add nutmeg and pepper.
Serve at once in fondue pot.

Place haddock and water in a dutch oven and heat to boiling.
Cover and reduce heat to low and simmer approximately 10-15 minutes or until the fish is white and flakes easily.

b4e4245834.gt:
Slice bananas and lay them out on cookie sheets, put into freezer for about 2 hours.
Take them from the freezer to your food processor or blender and blend them up, stopping every few min or so to scrap the sides down.
It does take a lil while but once it reaches the creaminess u like you can serve it as is and it will be more like a custard or put into a container and put into freezer til nice and thick like ice cream.
Update: If planning to keep this for a few days or so add a crushed vitamin C tablet and give it a good stir!
That's it!!!
Enjoy!!
!

a106242e0e.gt:
Preheat oven 350 degrees F.
Salt the zucchini lightly and let it sit for 15 minutes.
Squeeze out all the excess moisture using your hands.
I usually put enough into my palm and and squeeze.
Repeat as necessary.
Combine all crust ingredients except the olive oil, and spread into an olive oiled 9 x 13 inch baking pan.
Bake 20-25 minutes until the surface is dry and firm.
Brush the top with olive oil and broil it, under moderate heat for 5 minutes.
Do not let it burn.
Spread the pizza or tomato sauce evenly over the crust and scatter olives, green peppers, onions, mushrooms, artichoke hearts, mozzarella cheese, Swiss cheese, and Parmesan cheese over the crust or use your own topping of choice and bake in a 350 F oven for about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from oven and scatter fresh basil leaves.
Return the pizza to oven and bake for additional 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot, cut into squares.
Eaten with fork and knife.

To cook a delightful Linda's Zucchini-Crusted Pizza With Fresh Basil, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. Prepare the pizza dough by rolling it out on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
3. Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
4. Add your choice of toppings, such as sliced onions, mushrooms, bell peppers, and olives.
5. In a small bowl, mix together grated Parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
6. Dip each zucchini slice in the egg wash, then coat them in the Parmesan-bread crumb mixture.
7. Place the zucchini slices on the pizza dough, creating a crust.
8. Add a generous amount of fresh basil leaves on top of the zucchini slices.
9. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

This delicious pizza is a healthier alternative to traditional pizzas, as it uses zucchini slices instead of traditional crust. The combination of the zucchini crust, tomato sauce, and fresh basil creates a delightful and satisfying meal.

7ea397998a.gt:
Place the potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water.
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, 8 to 10 minutes.
Drain and allow to steam dry for a minute or two.
Place potatoes in a large bowl.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat; grease with cooking spray.
Cook and stir the green beans and onion until tender, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the garlic; cook and stir until garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute more.
Transfer the green bean mixture into the large bowl with the potatoes.
Add the balsamic vinaigrette, roasted red peppers, and basil; toss lightly.
Stir in the goat cheese.
7ea397998a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the green beans, potatoes, and goat cheese.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
4. Pour the dressing over the green beans and potatoes, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the potatoes are cooked through.
6. Serve the Warm Green Bean and Potato Salad immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

79aa81e6ca.gt:
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat; whisk in flour, and cook until flour turns from white to a nutty brown color, 2 to 3 minutes.
Stir in onion and cook until transparent, about 5 minutes.
Add meats and brown until no longer pink, 10 to 12 minutes; stir in Cajun seasoning and garlic powder; drain fat.
Cool to room temperature.
On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of 1/4 inch.
Use a 5 inch diameter round cookie cutter or cut around a saucer to make a round of dough.
Place a heaping tablespoon of meat filling in the center of each round.
Fold dough over filling and seal edges closed by pressing with a fork or fingers.
Repeat to make 15 pies, re-rolling dough scraps as needed.
Heat oil for frying in deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Deep fry pies in small batches until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes.
Drain on paper towels.
Or bake pies on greased cookie sheets in preheated 350 degree F (175 degrees C) oven 15 to 20 minutes, or until golden brown.

Make a well in the center of flour mixture.
In medium bowl, combine egg, buttermilk, orange juice concentrate and melted butter; add all at once to flour mixture.
Stir just until moistened (batter should be lumpy).
Fold in walnuts.
Line twelve 2-1/2-inch muffin cups with paper bake cups.
Fill the cups 3/4 full with batter.
Bake in a 400 degree F. oven for 18 to 20 minutes or until muffins are golden.
Remove the muffins from the pans.
In a small bowl, combine powdered sugar, orange peel and enough orange juice (2 to 3 teaspoons) to make a drizzling consistency.
Drizzle over warm muffins.

1. 1 cup of flour
2. 1 cup of sugar
3. 1 cup of chopped nuts (e.g., almonds, walnuts, or pecans)
4. 1 cup of orange juice
5. 1 egg
6. 1/2 cup of milk
7. 1/2 teaspoon of baking powder
8. 1/2 teaspoon of salt
9. 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon
10. 1/2 teaspoon of nutmeg
11. 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract
12. 1/4 cup of grated orange peel
13. 1/4 cup of chopped orange zest
14. 1/4 cup of unsalted butter, melted
15. 1/2 cup of chocolate chips (optional)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, chopped nuts, orange juice, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla extract, orange peel, and orange zest.
3. Stir the mixture until well combined.
4. Fold in the melted butter and chocolate chips (if using).
5. Scoop the batter into muffin cups, filling them about three-quarters full.
6. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your Orange-Nut Muffins!

To ensure a perfect Old-Fashioned Cream Gravy, follow these key steps:

1. Start by heating the saucepan over medium heat, and then add the flour, butter, and milk. Stir constantly to prevent lumps and ensure even cooking.
2. Gradually add the cold water, stirring constantly to prevent the mixture from burning or sticking to the bottom of the saucepan.
3. Continue to cook and stir until the gravy reaches the desired thickness. Adjust the heat as needed to achieve the desired consistency.
4. Season the gravy with salt and pepper to taste, ensuring that the flavors are well-balanced and complement the dish you are serving it with.

By following these key steps, you can create a delicious and satisfying Old-Fashioned Cream Gravy that will enhance the flavors of your meal.

To cook a delicious Low Fat Roasted Poatoes, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into even-sized pieces.
3. Toss the potatoes in a bowl with olive oil, salt, pepper, and any desired herbs or spices.
4. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet or roasting pan, ensuring they are evenly spaced.

6. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

d4627b79b5.gt:
Line a 4 1/2-by-8 1/2-inch loaf pan with 2 sheets of plastic wrap, leaving a 3-inch overhang on long sides.
In a blender, puree raspberries and sugar, scraping down sides as needed.
Strain through a fine-mesh sieve, pressing on solids; discard solids.
In a large bowl, whip cream until soft peaks form.
With a rubber spatula, fold in lemon curd.
Spoon 2 cups cream mixture into pan and smooth top.
Dip ladyfingers in raspberry puree and arrange in pan, parallel to long edges.
Pour remaining raspberry puree on ladyfingers.
Top with remaining cream mixture and smooth top.
Wrap pan with overhanging plastic and freeze 8 hours (or up to 2 weeks).
To serve, invert onto a serving platter, remove plastic, and slice.
Looking for more dessert ideas?
Check out our homemade chocolate chip cookie recipes, apple pie recipes, and chocolate cake recipes.

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: 1 cup of fresh raspberries, 1/2 cup of fresh lemon juice, 1 cup of heavy cream, 1/2 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup of cornstarch, 1/4 cup of water, and 1/4 cup of raspberry preserves.
2. In a saucepan, combine the raspberries, lemon juice, and sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
3. Remove the mixture from the heat and stir in the cornstarch mixture. Return the mixture to the saucepan and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.

6. Pour the cream mixture over the chilled raspberry mixture and stir gently to combine.
7. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours or until firm.
8. To serve, use a spatula to gently lift the semifreddo from the baking dish and place it on a plate.

Season the shrimp with salt and pepper, add to the skillet and cook over moderately high heat until lightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
Transfer to a plate.

Add the garlic and chiles and cook over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened, about 1 minute.
Add the clam juice and bring to a boil, then simmer over moderate heat until the broth has reduced by one-fourth, about 3 minutes.
Whisk in the butter a few cubes at a time until incorporated.
Add the shrimp and cherry tomatoes, season with salt and pepper and simmer until the shrimp are just cooked through, about 2 minutes longer.
Stir in the lemon juice, cilantro and chives and serve.

To create a mouthwatering Mary's Orange Slice Cake, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the orange juice, and mix until just combined.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
8. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once the cake is completely cooled, use a sharp knife to slice it into equal portions.
11. To make the orange glaze, combine the powdered sugar, orange juice, and a splash of water in a small bowl. Stir until smooth and drizzle the glaze over the sliced cake.

Enjoy your delicious Mary's Orange Slice Cake!
<</SYS>>

2cf467b3f7.gt:
Season all sides of the beef with a fair amount of salt and pepper.
In a large Dutch oven, or other heavy pot that has a tight cover, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over moderately high heat.
Add the garlic and the beef to the pot, browning the meat on all sides, taking the time to get a nice crust on the outside.
Add the onion and allow to lightly brown, about 3 to 4 minutes.
Add the crushed tomatoes, plus 1 tomato can of water, spices, season with salt and pepper, to taste, and add enough water to cover the meat.
Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer with a lid for 3 hours, or until the meat is fork tender.
Let meat cool some in the liquid.
Shred meat and place in store bought taco shells, make your own taco shells, or even roll up in warm flour tortillas.
Garnish with lettuce, cheese and chopped tomatoes--if desired.

To make Easy Cream Tomato Soup, you will need the following ingredients:
- 2 cups of fresh tomatoes
- 1/2 cup of heavy cream
- 1/2 cup of chicken or vegetable broth
- 1/2 cup of grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/4 cup of chopped fresh basil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Optional: 1/4 cup of crushed red pepper flakes for extra heat

1. In a large pot or saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the grated Parmesan cheese and stir until melted and combined.
4. Add the heavy cream, chicken or vegetable broth, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until they are soft and the soup has thickened slightly.
6. Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the grated basil. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
7. If desired, add a pinch of crushed red pepper flakes for extra heat.
8. Serve the Easy Cream Tomato Soup hot, garnished with additional grated Parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves if desired.

Enjoy your delicious and comforting Easy Cream Tomato Soup!

1. In a large pot, combine 1 cup of red lentils, 4 cups of water, and 1 teaspoon of salt. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.

2. While the lentils are cooking, heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon of oil, and cook 1 chopped onion until it is soft and translucent.

3. Add 1 chopped carrot and 1 chopped celery stalk to the skillet, and cook for an additional 5 minutes.

4. Add 1 minced garlic and cook for 1 minute more.

5. Add 1 cup of vegetable or chicken broth, and bring the mixture to a boil.

6. Add the cooked lentils to the skillet, and stir to combine.

7. Add 1 cup of red wine, and bring the mixture to a boil.

8. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let the soup simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender and the flavors have melded together.

9. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.

10. Serve the Red Lentil Soup hot, garnished with a dollop of yogurt, a sprinkle of fresh parsley, and a drizzle of olive oil, if desired.

To make delicious Bulgogi, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the marinade: In a large bowl, mix together soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sugar, and sesame oil.
2. Season the beef: Place the thinly sliced beef in a separate bowl, and pour the marinade over it. Allow the beef to marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours.
3. Heat the pan: In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium-high heat.
4. Cook the beef: Remove the beef from the marinade, and cook it in the hot pan until it is browned on all sides.
5. Add the vegetables: Once the beef is cooked, add the sliced onions, bell peppers, and mushrooms to the pan. Cook for a few minutes until the vegetables are tender.
6. Add the sauce: Pour the marinade mixture over the beef and vegetables, and stir to combine.
7. Cook the Bulgogi: Cook the mixture over medium heat for about 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the beef is cooked through.
8. Serve: Serve the cooked Bulgogi over rice, noodles, or on its own, and enjoy the delicious and flavorful meal.

[/INST]

[/INST]

To make Easy Risotto with Leftover Minestrone, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of Arborio rice
- 2 cups of vegetable or chicken broth
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 cup of grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 cup of heavy cream
- 1/2 cup of leftover minestrone (or any other vegetable soup)
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Freshly ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 2 cups of grated Pecorino Romano cheese
- Optional: 1/4 cup of grated Pecorino Romano cheese for topping

1. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is softened, about 3 minutes.
2. Add the rice to the saucepan, stirring to coat the rice with the oil. Cook for 1 minute, then pour in the vegetable or chicken broth.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan, and simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat, and stir in the heavy cream, minestrone, and Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper, to taste.
5. Return the saucepan to the heat, and stir until the cheese is melted and the risotto is heated through.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat, and stir in the grated Pecorino Romano cheese.
7. Serve the risotto immediately, and if desired, top with additional grated Pecorino Romano cheese.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Risotto with Leftover Minestrone!

7f9c7a1b1f.gt:
About one hour before smoking, coat both sides of ribs with a little vegetable oil and sprinkle with Chinese 5 spice.
Set aside at room temperature for 1 hour.
Heat charcoal or gas grill for indirect cooking at 230 to 250 degrees F. Add drained wood chips, if using.
Place the ribs, meaty side down, over a drip pan and cook for 2 hours.
Add about 12 coals to a charcoal grill every 45 minutes or so to maintain the heat.
Remove ribs from grill.
Double-wrap each rack in heavy-duty aluminum foil.
Return wrapped ribs to the grill and cook for 1 1/2 to 2 hours more over indirect heat, until very tender.
Add more coals as needed to maintain temperature for a charcoal grill.
Meanwhile, make the glaze.
Combine all ingredients in small saucepan.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat; reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes, stirring frequently.
Remove ribs from grill and unwrap.
Place ribs over direct heat on grill and brush with honey red pepper glaze.
Cook for about 5 minutes until the glaze is set.
Turn ribs and repeat with more glaze.

4. Place the ribs in a baking dish, and pour the honey mixture over them.
5. Cover the dish with foil, and bake for 1.5 to 2 hours, or until the meat is tender and the glaze is caramelized.
6. Remove the foil, and continue to bake for an additional 15 to 20 minutes, or until the glaze is bubbly and slightly crispy.
7. Serve the glazed ribs hot, and enjoy!

In the same pot, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat, add the onion and garlic, and saute until soft.
Add the beans and water or stock.
Cover and bring to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low, add the rosemary, and simmer 2 hours or until the beans are tender.
Raise heat to high, add the pasta, and cook until al dente.
Season the soup to taste with salt and pepper, garnish with the chopped parsey.
Serve accompanied by grated Parmesan cheese and the optional extra-virgin olive oil.
e993bcfbe8.pred:
1. Begin by gathering the necessary ingredients:
- 1 pound of pasta (preferably whole wheat)
- 1 pound of beans (cannellini or kidney beans)
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 cup of diced tomatoes
- 1 cup of water
- 1/2 cup of olive oil
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Optional: 1/2 cup of grated Parmesan cheese

2. In a large pot, bring the water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
3. In a separate pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Add the canned beans, tomatoes, and their juice, and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper, to taste.
5. Reduce the heat to low, and let the mixture simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. If desired, add the grated Parmesan cheese to the pot and stir until melted and combined.
7. Once the pasta is cooked, drain it and add it to the pot with the beans and tomatoes. Stir to combine, and let the mixture simmer for a few more minutes.
8. Serve the Pasta Fagioli hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

4eef71a937.gt:
Pare and cut eggplant into 1/2 inch slices.
Set oven control at broil and/or 550 degrees.
Place eggplant slices on rack in broiler pan.
Brush butter on slices; season with salt and pepper.
Broil with tops about 3 inches from heat until eggplant is hot and tender.
about 6 minutes.
In a small saucepan, heat tomato sauce and garlic powder, stirring occasionally.
Serve on eggplant slices.
4eef71a937.pred:
To cook a delicious Broiled Eggplant With Tomato Sauce, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the eggplant into evenly sized pieces, and season them with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil.
3. Place the eggplant pieces on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly browned.
4. In a large saucepan, heat some oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook for a few seconds, then add the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, and a pinch of sugar. Cook for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and reduced.
5. Season the sauce with salt, pepper, and a pinch of red pepper flakes, if desired.
6. When the eggplant is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Place the cooked eggplant on a serving plate, and pour the tomato sauce over it.
8. Serve the Broiled Eggplant With Tomato Sauce immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

Ingredients: eggplant, tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, salt, pepper, sugar, red pepper flakes (optional).

87047dd9ed.gt:
Butter an 8x8 inch (20cmx20cm) pan or line it with parchment paper leaving a 2-inch/5 cm paper overhang on two sides.
In a bowl, mix together the crushed cookie crumbs, melted butter and sugar.
Transfer to the pan and press it down lightly and evenly with your fingers to cover the entire bottom of the dish.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
In a large microwave safe bowl combine condensed milk, butter and salt.
Microwave on high for 3 minutes.
Remove bowl from the microwave.
It will be very bubbly.
Add the chocolate chips or chopped chocolate.
Stir well until all the chocolate is melted and the mixture is really smooth.
Add the lemon curd, lemon juice, lemon extract and lemon zest.
Mix one more time.
Pour the lemon mixture on top of the cookie crust and spread evenly to the edges of the prepared pan.
Smooth the top.
Sprinkle marshmallows on top and press lightly to make sure it will stick to the bars.
Refrigerate or freeze until completely set.
Using the parchment paper overhangs, lift bars from pan and transfer to a cutting board.
Use a kitchen torch to lightly brown the marshmallows if you want to and then cut into 25 squares.
Eat them all or try not to!
87047dd9ed.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]1. Prepare the crust: In a large mixing bowl, combine the crushed graham crackers, melted butter, and sugar. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch springform pan. Refrigerate for 15 minutes.

2. Prepare the filling: In a separate mixing bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gradually add the sugar, lemon juice, and vanilla extract, continuing to beat until the mixture is smooth and fluffy.

3. Assemble the pie bars: Spread the lemon filling evenly over the prepared crust. Carefully pour the meringue mixture over the filling, creating a smooth layer.

4. Bake the pie bars: Bake the pie bars in a preheated oven at 325°F (163°C) for 35-40 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.

5. Cool and chill: Allow the pie bars to cool completely in the pan. Then, transfer the pie bars to the refrigerator to chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

6. Garnish: If desired, garnish the pie bars with a dusting of powdered sugar or a drizzle of lemon glaze.

7. Serve: Enjoy your delicious No-Bake Lemon Meringue Pie Bars!

[/INST]

[/INST]

5af1409bc9.gt:
Pick over the lentils, discarding any misshapen lentils or stones.
Rinse the lentils until the water runs clear, then drain.
In a saucepan over high heat, combine the lentils, water, turmeric and the 1 teaspoon ghee.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce the heat to medium, cover and simmer until the lentils are soft and tender, about 30 minutes.
In a frying pan over medium-high heat, warm the remaining 2 tablespoons ghee.
When hot, add the mustard seeds and fry until they turn gray, spatter, and pop, about 2 minutes.
Add the chillies, onion, garlic, ginger and curry leaves and saute until the onion is soft and golden, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the garam masala and tomatoes ad cook for 1 minute.
Pour the onion mixture into the pan of cooked lentils, add the salt and simmer for 5 minutes to blend the flavours.
Transfer to a serving dish and serve.
5af1409bc9.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: rice, lentils, tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, and spices like cumin, turmeric, and coriander.
2. Rinse the rice and lentils thoroughly.
3. In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add onions and sauté until they are translucent.
4. Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for a few seconds.
5. Add the rinsed rice and lentils to the pot, stirring to combine.
6. Pour in enough water to cover the rice and lentils, and bring the mixture to a boil.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the lentils are tender.
8. Add the chopped tomatoes, and continue to cook for another 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
9. Season the Dal with the cumin, turmeric, and coriander, and adjust the seasoning as needed.
10. Serve the Dal hot, garnished with fresh cilantro or green onions, if desired.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

6ac54b5e92.gt:
Cream butter and sugar.
Add egg and beat well.
Combine buttermilk and soda.
Combine flour and spices.
Add alternately with buttermilk, beginning and ending with flour.
Stir in apple butter and pecans.
Pour into greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350*F for 1 hour or until wooden pick inserted comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 5 minutes; remove to wire rack and cool completely.

c833711642.gt:
Season chops with salt and pepper.
In a large skillet, brown pork chops in olive oil.
In a small bowl, combine the cider, brown sugar, vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, mustard, and ginger.
Pour over the chops.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat medium or medium low heat; cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender.

Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix crushed cookies, butter,pecans, and coconut; press firmly onto bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan.
Refrigerate while preparing filling.
Beat cream cheese and sugar in a large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended.
Add eggs, one at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended.
Pour over crust.
Bake 40 minutes or until center is almost set.Cool.
Refrigerate 3 hours or overnight.
Place whipping cream and chocolate in saucepan.
Cook on low heat until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is well blended, stirring occasionally.
Pour over cheesecake.
Refrigerate 15 minutes or until chocolate is firm.
Store leftover cheesecake in refrigerate.
Note: To make cheesecake extra special, Once chocolate topping is firm, place 2 additional chocolate squares in microwaveable bowl.
Microwave on medium 1 minute, stirring after 30 seconds.
Stir till chocolate is completely melted.Pour into small reusable bag; seal bag; twist bag.
Snip off one small corner from bottom of bag; twist top of bag to squeeze chocolate from bag; to pipe a special message, such as "Greetings" on top of cheesecake.
Chill time includes.

In a large bowl, whisk all dry ingredients together to combine.
Form a well in the middle of the dry ingredients.
Measure and pour the remaining wet ingredients into the well.

In a small bowl, combine the hoisin, soy sauce, wine, honey and garlic.
Line a baking sheet with foil and spray it lightly with cooking spray; set aside.
Place the salmon fillets on the baking sheet, and spoon the sauce over the fillets, trying to keep as much on each fillet as possible.
Bake for 15 to 18 minutes, depending on the thickness of your fillets, until just cooked through.
*Note: If you want extra sauce for after the fish is done baking (because the sauce in the oven sort of caramelizes), then I recommend doubling the sauce and reserving half of it for pouring over the fish after it is done baking.
Just be sure NOT to touch any utensils that touched the raw fish into the reserved sauce.

Preheat oven to 425 F.
Wrap potatoes in aluminum foil.
Bake potatoes on a pan in the oven until done, about an hour.
Remove foil and let potatoes cool to room temperature.
Put potatoes on a plate, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight.
Grate the chilled potatoes, including skins.
You can use a large box grater or a food processor.
(I like the food processor!)
Transfer grated potatoes to a bowl and sprinkle in the shallots, 1 3/4 cup cheese, salt, and pepper.
Use your hands to gently toss together.
(I guess you could stir it too but you would miss all the fun.
Go ahead, plunge those hands down in there!)
Then fold in sour cream.
Transfer mixture to a 1 1/2 quart gratin dish, making sure that you dont compress (or squash, or moosh, or squish) it!
Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top.
Bake at 350 F until the top is golden brown, about 30 minutes.
Serves 6.
Recipe slightly adapted from williams-sonoma.com via Strip House.

Preheat a heavy bottomed skille tover medium-high heat.
Pour in the oil and add the zucchini and jalapeno, sprinkle with the salt.
Saute for about 7 minutes, or until the zucchini is lightly browned.
Add the garlic, olives, cumin, and coriander, and saute for 2 minutes more.
Add the salsa verde and black beans and cook for 5 minutes.
The salsa should reduce a bit so its not soupy.
Mix the ingredients for the Garlic-Lemon Yogurt if your using.
Warm the tortillas in a skillet or wrap in a moist towel & nuke for a minute.
Assembly the tacos by adding the filling, yogurt, and topping with scallions.

To make Black Bean, Zucchini, & Olive Tacos, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the black beans by rinsing them and cooking them in a pot with water until they are tender.
2. While the beans are cooking, chop the zucchini into small pieces and sauté them in olive oil until they are tender.
3. In a separate pan, sauté the onions and garlic until they are soft and fragrant.
4. Add the cooked black beans to the onion and garlic mixture and stir to combine.
5. In a small bowl, mix the cumin, salt, and pepper. Add the cumin mixture to the black bean mixture and stir to combine.
6. Squeeze a lime over the mixture to add a burst of freshness.

8. Assemble the tacos by placing a spoonful of the black bean mixture on each tortilla, topped with chopped cilantro and a slice of avocado.
9. Serve the tacos with a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

62880ae3e8.gt:
Place the potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water.
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes.
Drain and allow to steam dry for a minute or two.
Return the drained potatoes to the pot.
Pour the vegetable broth, thyme, rosemary, oregano, basil, onion powder, parsley, sage, and garlic over the potatoes; mash with a potato masher.

To make Italian Mashed Potatoes, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large pot, bring the potatoes to a boil in salted water. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.
4. Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot. Add the milk, butter, grated Parmesan cheese, and freshly ground black pepper.
5. Using a potato masher or a fork, mash the potatoes until they reach the desired consistency. You can also use a food processor or a blender for a smoother texture.
6. Season the mashed potatoes with additional salt and pepper, if needed.
7. Transfer the mashed potatoes to a serving dish and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Italian Mashed Potatoes!

0e47e93343.gt:
Place pork in a wide nonstick frying pan.
Drain about 1/2 cup liquid from tomatoes into pan.
Bring to a boil over high heat; then reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes.
Uncover pan; add onions, celery, oregano, and sage.
Cook over high heat, stirring often, until liquid has evaporated and drippings are browned (8 to 10 minutes).
Add bay leaves.
Cut up tomatoes then add tomatoes and their remaining liquid and stir to scrape browned bits free.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 more minutes.
Stir in bell pepper and chilies; cover and continue to cook stirring occasionally until pork is very tender when pierced (about 15 more minutes).
If chili is too thin, uncover and simmer until it's as thick as you like.
Skim and discard fat, if necessary.
To serve, spoon chili over rice and garnish with cilantro sprigs.

To prepare a delicious Chili Verde, you will need the following ingredients:
1. 1 pound of ground beef
2. 1 onion, diced
3. 3 cloves of garlic, minced
4. 1 can of diced tomatoes
5. 1 can of green chilies (such as Hatch or Anaheim)
6. 1 cup of beef broth
7. 1/2 cup of water
8. 1/2 teaspoon of ground cumin
9. 1/2 teaspoon of ground oregano
10. 1/4 teaspoon of ground red pepper
11. Salt and pepper, to taste

First, heat a large skillet or saucepan over medium heat. Add the ground beef and cook until it is browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.

Next, add the onion and garlic to the skillet. Cook until the onion is softened, about 5 minutes.

Pour in the canned tomatoes and green chilies, and stir to combine. Add the beef broth, water, cumin, oregano, red pepper, salt, and pepper. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the chili has thickened and the flavors have melded together.

Taste the chili and adjust the seasoning as needed. Serve the Chili Verde hot, garnished with any desired toppings, such as shredded cheese, sour cream, or chopped cilantro. Enjoy!

[/INST]

fa63e5df5b.gt:
Preheat the oven to 425.
Season the chicken breast with 1/8 teaspoon each of sea salt and freshly ground pepper.
In a small pan, heat 1 tablespoon of extra-virgin olive oil over medium high heat.
Add the chicken and cook for 1 minute.
Turn the chicken, reduce the heat, cover and cook for 8 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat and leave covered for 10 minutes, then shred the chicken with 2 forks.
In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, water, soy sauce, garlic and the remaining sea salt and freshly ground pepper and whisk to combine.
In an 8-inch-square baking dish, combine the shredded chicken, onion, egg noodles, the cheese, broccoli and the sauce and mix thoroughly.
Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 10 minutes.
Uncover the dish, stir well and bake for 15 minutes, until the noodles are cooked and the sauce has thickened.
Remove from the oven and let sit for 5 minutes before serving.

6ea1219c93.gt:
Chop the sweet potato into small cubes, and soak in water to remove the bitterness.
Transfer to a heatproof dish, wrap in plastic wrap, and microwave (for 2 to 3 minutes at 500W).
Heat water and sugar in a sauce pan, and add the sweet potatoes once the sugar dissolves.
Simmer until the liquid boils out.
Bring the eggs to room temperature.
Sift together the almond powder, cake flour, cinnamon, and baking powder.
Microwave or double boil the butter to melt.
Beat the egg in a bowl, add the brown sugar and honey, and mix well.
There's no need to beat until foamy.
Sift in the dry ingredients, stir until smooth, then add the rum.
Mix in the melted butter, a little at a time, then add about half of the boiled sweet potatoes and lightly mix.
Pour into small baking cups, top with the remaining sweet potatoes, and sprinkle black sesame seeds.
Bake for about 20 minutes in an oven at 170C.

To cook delicious Moist Sweet Potato Cakes, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Peel and chop the sweet potatoes into small, even pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sweet potatoes, eggs, sugar, baking powder, and cinnamon. Mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, salt, and baking soda. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until well combined.
5. Pour the batter onto a greased baking sheet or a silicone mat.
6. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cakes comes out clean.
7. Allow the cakes to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

These Moist Sweet Potato Cakes are a delicious and healthy alternative to traditional sweet treats. The sweet potatoes provide natural sweetness and a moist texture, while the cinnamon and baking powder add a warm, spiced flavor. Enjoy your homemade sweet potato cakes!

1. In a large pot, sauté 2 cups of diced onions in 2 tablespoons of butter until they are soft and translucent.

To make Dennis' Honey-Mustard Salad Dressing, you will need the following ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons of honey
- 2 tablespoons of mustard (Dijon or whole-grain)
- 1/2 cup of olive oil
- 1/4 cup of vinegar (white or red wine vinegar)
- 1/4 cup of soy sauce
- 1/4 cup of minced garlic
- 1/4 cup of minced onion
- 1/4 cup of lemon juice
- 1/4 cup of water

First, combine the honey, mustard, olive oil, vinegar, soy sauce, minced garlic, minced onion, lemon juice, water, and salt and pepper in a small bowl. Whisk the ingredients together until well combined.

If the dressing is too thick, you can add a bit more water to achieve the desired consistency. If it's too thin, you can add a bit more honey or mustard to thicken it.

Once the dressing is to your liking, you can pour it over your salad, tossing it gently to coat the ingredients evenly.

Enjoy your delicious Honey-Mustard Salad Dressing!

To craft delicious Bryan's Buttermilk Pancakes, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together 1 cup of buttermilk, 1 cup of all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, and 1/2 cup of unsalted butter.
2. Add 1 egg and 1 cup of milk to the batter, and whisk until smooth.

4. Pour the batter onto the pan or griddle, using a ladle or a spoon to create evenly sized pancakes. Cook the pancakes until bubbles appear on the surface and the edges start to curl, then flip them and cook for another minute or until golden brown.

To create a mouthwatering Mediterranean Chicken for Two, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, and any other desired ingredients such as oregano, rosemary, or parsley.
4. Pour the marinade over the chicken breasts and let them marinate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
5. While the chicken is marinating, prepare the vegetables. Cut the bell peppers, zucchini, and onions into bite-sized pieces.
6. In a separate large bowl, mix together the breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, and any additional seasonings you prefer.
7. Drain the marinated chicken and pat it dry with paper towels.
8. Coat the chicken breasts in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing to ensure even coverage.
9. Heat a large skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil and cook the chicken until it is golden brown and cooked through.
10. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
11. Add the bell peppers, zucchini, and onions to the pan, and cook until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
12. Add the marinated chicken back to the pan, and toss everything together to combine the flavors.
13. Transfer the chicken and vegetables to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
14. Serve the Mediterranean Chicken for Two immediately, and enjoy the delicious and satisfying meal!

fd78cf3ab6.gt:
Cut the tortillas into quarters.
In a large skillet, heat the oil and fry the tortilla pieces until crunchy.
Lower the heat to low.
Add the red chile sauce and mix gently through the tortilla pieces.
Top with the shredded cheese and cook until the cheese just starts to melt.
Remove from the heat and serve with your choice of eggs.
Garnish with chopped green and red onions.
For the sauce: Remove the stems, seeds and veins from the chile pods.
Rinse with cold water.
Add the chiles to a pot and add enough water just to cover them.
Bring to a boil and simmer covered for 20 minutes.
After 10 minutes turn the chiles over to cook evenly.
Drain and cool.
In a blender, mix 3 cups of water, half of the cooked chile pods, 3 Tablespoons flour, 2 cloves garlic and half the salt.
Blend until smooth.
Strain the sauce removing any seeds.
Repeat this process with the rest of the ingredients and set aside to cool.
Recipe from Muy Bueno Cook Book.

1. Ingredients:
- 4 cups of tortilla chips
- 2 cups of salsa
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1/2 cup of grated cheese (such as cheddar or Monterey Jack)
- 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes
- 1/2 cup of diced onions
- 1/2 cup of lime juice
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Optional: cilantro, avocado, and/or jalapeños

1. Preparation:
- Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
- In a large bowl, combine the tortilla chips, salsa, sour cream, grated cheese, diced tomatoes, diced onions, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
- Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet, and bake for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chips are crispy and the cheese is melted.
- Serve the Chilaquiles Rojas hot, garnished with cilantro, avocado, and/or jalapeños, if desired.

Chilaquiles Rojas is a delicious Mexican dish that combines crispy tortilla chips with a flavorful salsa, sour cream, and melted cheese. The dish is topped with diced tomatoes, onions, and lime juice, which add a burst of freshness and acidity. The combination of crunchy chips, creamy sour cream, and melted cheese creates a satisfying and comforting meal. The dish can be customized with additional ingredients, such as cilantro, avocado, and/or jalapeños, to enhance the flavors and textures.

To make Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1 cup of granulated sugar
- 1/2 cup of unsalted butter, softened
- 1/2 cup of milk
- 2 eggs
- 1 teaspoon of baking powder
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 cup of chocolate chips
- 1/4 cup of strong coffee
- 2 tablespoons of vanilla extract
- 1/4 cup of oats
- 1/4 cup of chopped nuts (optional)

Here's the step-by-step guide to making these delicious cookies:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Stir in the chocolate chips and strong coffee.
7. If the dough is too dry, you can add a bit more milk, 1 tablespoon at a time.
8. Fold in the oats and chopped nuts, if using.
9. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
10. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the cookies are set.
11. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies!

ec8f7992cb.gt:
Cover a large flat surface with waxed paper.
In a large bowl, stir together the popcorn, cereal, corn chips, almonds, and pretzels.
Melt the confectioners' coating in a glass bowl in the microwave for 1 minute.
Continue to cook at 30 second intervals, stirring between each one, until the coating is smooth.
Pour melted coating over the cereal mixture.
It's best to use a large metal spoon, and pour 1 or 2 spoonfuls at a time then mix to ensure even distribution.
(A second person can be useful here - one to pour, one to mix.)
Once everything is coated, spread the mixture out onto waxed paper in a thin layer.
Let stand for about 1/2 hour, or until coating is dry.
Transfer to a bowl to serve, or store in an airtight container.

55412fa6ca.gt:
Combine butter, sugar, corn syrup and spices in a saucepan.
Over low-medium heat, stir ingredients constantly until ingredients look like they are about to boil.
Remove from heat and transfer to a mixing bowl.
Allow sugar mixture to cool to room temperature.
Stirring occasionally might help speed up this process.
Stir eggs into cooled sugar mixture.
Sift flour and baking soda together and add to sugar mixture.
Mix well.
Roll dough into a ball.
Cover and chill in the refrigerator for 8-12 hours or overnight.
Split dough into 2 parts; Roll dough about 1/4-inch thick on a clean, floured surface.
Cut into desired shapes.
Bake in preheated oven at 350F for about 10-15 minutes, or until firm to the touch.
Cookies can be left plain, or decorated with pipped icing.
NOTE: This makes a crisp cookie, if a softer cookie is desired you may substitute brown sugar for the granulated sugar.

fc76b776c7.gt:
Pre-heat oven to gas mark 2/300F/150C.
Prepare a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
First of all, beat the butter in a bowl with a wooden spoon to soften it.
Beat in the sugar, followed by the sifted flour and semolina.
Work the ingredients together with the spoon, pressing them to the side of the bowl, then finish off with your hands until you have a smooth mixture that doesn't leave any bits in the bowl.
Divide the mixture into 9, and shape each portion into a ball (dust the work surface with flour if you find the mixture too sticky to work with).
Flatten each one slightly and prick the centre with a fork (but not all the way through).
To make it look pretty, make a 1 cm crinkly border on the top by lightly pressing a fork making a slight indent working all the way around (working for the edge towards the centre).
Make sure that the biscuits are at least 1/2 inch in thickness (with the indentations at the edges).
Place onto the prepared baking sheet, very well spaced out as they will spread out quite a bit during baking.
Bake them for 50-60 minutes on the centre shelf of the oven (keep an eye on it after 45 mins - the edges seem to colour more easily than the top) it should have turned pale gold and feel firm in the centre.
Remove from the oven and dust the top with caster sugar.
Leave it to cool for 5 minutes on the baking tray before transferring them onto a wire rack to cool completely.
Store in an airtight container.

5. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25cm).

7. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

To craft Shu Jam Fizz, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup of corn syrup, and 1/2 cup of water.
2. Heat the mixture in the microwave or on the stovetop until the sugar has dissolved.
3. Add 1/2 cup of lemon juice and stir to combine.
4. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes.
5. Carefully pour the mixture into a glass bottle, leaving enough room at the top for the fizz to form.
6. Add 1/2 cup of club soda to the bottle, ensuring the mixture is well-mixed.
7. Seal the bottle and shake it vigorously to create the fizz.
8. Store the bottle in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.

Shu Jam Fizz is a refreshing and fizzy drink that combines the sweetness of sugar, corn syrup, and lemon juice with the carbonation of club soda. This recipe is perfect for hot summer days or as a fun and easy-to-make beverage for any occasion.

In a glass, muddle sugar and lime together.

3. Squeeze the juice from the Passion Fruit and set aside.
4. Crush the lime and mix it with sugar to taste.

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.

- 1 cup (200g) all-purpose flour
- 1 cup (200g) granulated sugar

Enjoy your delicious homemade Basic Cookie Mix!

7dc021d68f.gt:
Peel the potatoes and slice them really thin, dropping the slices into a bowl of cold water as you go along.
When they are all sliced, drain and pat dry.
Melt 2 tbls.
of the butter in a 10" nonstick skillet.
Swirl the butter to coat the surface; then remove the skillet from the heat.
Arrange 1/3 of the potato slices in a spiral, starting in the center and overlapping, so that the bottom of the skillet is covered.
Cut 2 tbls.
of the butter into small pieces and sprinkle them over the potatoes.
Then sprinkle the potatoes with 1/2 teaspoons of the rosemary,1/2 tsp of the parsley, 1/4 teaspoons of the thyme, and salt and pepper.
Repeat, making 2 more layers of potates, butter, and seasonings, pressing each layer down with a spatula.
Place the skillet over medium low heat, and cook until the bottom is crisp and golen brown, 45 minutes.
Then invert the galette onto a flat plate and slip it back into the skillet.
Continue cooking until the other side is golden, 10 to 15 minutes.
Invert the galette agaiin onto a serving platter.
Cut it into wedges and serve immediately.
Enjoy!

1. Rosemary
2. Potatoes
3. Flour
4. Eggs
5. Salt
6. Pepper
7. Olive oil
8. Butter

10. Breadcrumbs (optional)

To make the Rosemary Potato Galette, start by preheating your oven to 375°F (190°C).

1. Peel and chop the potatoes into evenly sized pieces.
2. In a large bowl, mix the chopped potatoes with rosemary, salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil. Toss to coat evenly.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and add a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. In a large skillet, heat some butter over medium heat. Add the flour and cook, stirring constantly, until it forms a smooth, golden-brown roux.
5. Slowly pour the whisked eggs into the roux, stirring continuously to prevent lumps. Cook until the mixture thickens and coats the back of a spoon.
6. Add the cooked potatoes to the egg mixture, stirring to combine.
7. Preheat your oven-safe skillet or baking sheet.
8. Pour the potato and egg mixture onto the prepared skillet or baking sheet.
9. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is set.
10. If desired, top the galette with cheese (such as cheddar or goat cheese) and breadcrumbs before baking.
11. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Rosemary Potato Galette!

255666c11a.gt:

In a bowl, cover the chipotle with hot water and let stand until softened, 30 minutes.
Bake the halved apples cut side down on a rimmed baking sheet for 30 minutes, until tender.
Let cool.
Scoop the apple pulp into a food processor and discard the skins.

Meanwhile, spread the bread in a pie plate and bake the pieces for about 10 minutes, until golden.
In a saucepan, boil the hard cider with the vinegar, sugar and apple puree.
Simmer, stirring, until reduced to 3/4 cup, 10 minutes.
Remove from the heat and season with salt.
Light a grill.
Grill the sausages over moderate heat, turning, until lightly charred on both sides and cooked through, 12 minutes.
Transfer to a plate and tent with foil.
In a skillet, heat the oil until shimmering.
Add the broccoli and season with salt.
Cover and cook until browned, 2 minutes.
Stir in the mustard, caraway, cider sauce and 1/2 cup of water and bring to a boil.
Remove from the heat, stir in the butter and season with salt.
Serve the sausages with the broccoli and sauce, garnishing with the bread crumbs and apple matchsticks.
