2989cc6886.gt:
Dredge the well drained oysters in some starch and toss them very gently in a bowl till the liquid turns dark.
Wash out the darkened liquid with cold water until the water becomes clear.
Drain well.
Place the oysters between paper towels and dry.
Coat the oysters lightly with some flour (not listed in the ingredients above).
Heat some salad oil in a non-stick frying pan, add garlic, stir fry till they become golden over medium heat.
Add oysters cook until golden.
Turn over, add the Sake and cover.
Cook for 2 to 3 minutes over low heat.
Add and melt the butter.
Add soy sauce and green onion and stir to coat the oysters with sauce.
Serve hot.
Washing oysters with starch to purify the taste is a method I learned from Chinese recipe while traditionalist Japanese chefs use graded Daikon radish juice.
Buttered ride recipe is available in my blog.
http://kcocoangela.blog132.fc2.com/blog-entry-6.html

To prepare a delicious Pan fried Oyster with Green Onion Sauce, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the oysters: First, clean the oysters thoroughly and remove their shells. You can either do this yourself or purchase pre-shelled oysters from a store.

2. Prepare the sauce: In a small bowl, mix together green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and a pinch of sugar. Set aside.

3. Prepare the pan: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.

4. Prepare the oysters: In a separate bowl, mix together cornstarch and a little water to form a slurry. Dip each oyster in the cornstarch mixture, then coat it with the beaten egg.

5. Cook the oysters: Carefully place the coated oysters in the hot pan, making sure not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for about 2 minutes or until the edges turn golden brown.

6. Add the sauce: Once the oysters are cooked, carefully pour the green onion sauce over the oysters in the pan. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes or until the sauce has thickened and the oysters are fully cooked through.

7. Serve: Remove the cooked oysters from the pan and place them on a serving plate. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious Pan fried Oyster with Green Onion Sauce.

Ingredients:
- Oysters
- Green onions
- Minced garlic
- Soy sauce
- Sugar
- Cornstarch
- Beaten egg
- Non-stick pan

Mix together 1 cup sugar and 1 Tbsp cinnamon in a small bowl.
Set aside.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a muffin pan or use paper muffin cups.
Cream the butter and 1/2 cup sugar until soft, about 3 to 5 minutes.
Add in the vanilla.
Add in the eggs one at a time and mix until well incorporated.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cream of tartar and nutmeg.
Add the flour mixture and the sour cream alternately to the egg-butter mixture in multiple additions.
Start with the flour and end with the flour.
Scrape the bowl occasionally.
Using an ice cream scoop, scoop out muffin batter one at a time and drop into the bowl filled with the cinnamon sugar mixture.
Roll the muffin around in the mixture until it is covered completely in cinnamon sugar.
Place muffin into muffin tin.
Depending on the size of your tins, you should get about 14 to 18 muffins.
Bake them for approximately 20-22 minutes or until they are golden brown.

To create a delicious Russian Pork Chops and Potatoes in Sour Cream Sauce, follow these steps:

Place the bowl and blade of a food processor into the freezer to chill for 4 to 5 hours.
Refit the bowl and blade, turn on the food processor, and pour the cream through the feed tube.
Continue to process for about 10 minutes, until the Butter has hardened around the blade, leaving the liquid that has separated from the cream in the bottom of the bowl.
Transfer the Butter to a fine sieve and shake 2 or 3 times over the sink to allow any excess liquid to drain.
Put the butter in a bowl, cover, and chill for at least 1 hour before using.
Store it in the refrigerator, where it has a shelf life of about 1 week.
While holding the ruler, grab the end of the top layer of wax paper and slowly pull it toward you; this will form the Butter into the shape of a log.

To prepare a delicious homemade butter, you will need the following ingredients:
1. 1 cup of unsalted butter
2. 1/2 cup of granulated sugar
3. 1/2 cup of all-purpose flour
4. 1/4 cup of milk
5. 1/4 cup of heavy cream
6. 1/4 cup of powdered sugar
7. 1/4 teaspoon of vanilla extract
8. 1/4 teaspoon of salt

First, place the butter in a large mixing bowl. Then, add the sugar, flour, milk, cream, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, and salt. Mix the ingredients together until they are well combined.

Next, place the bowl in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes to allow the butter to harden. This step is important as it helps the butter to become more firm and easier to shape.

After the 30 minutes, remove the bowl from the refrigerator and use a spatula to scrape the butter mixture onto a clean, flat surface. You can also use a rolling pin to help shape the butter into a smooth, even log.

Once the butter is shaped, place it back in the refrigerator for another 30 minutes to allow it to harden further. After this time, you can remove the butter from the refrigerator and use a sharp knife to cut it into the desired size and shape.

Place the cut butter on a plate and let it come to room temperature before serving. This will allow the butter to soften and become more spreadable.

Enjoy your homemade butter!

Add the rest of the red pepper flakes, 3/4t salt, sugar, tomatoes, and wine; heat on medium high and then simmer until thickened, about 8 minutes.
Stir in shrimp with accumulated juices, remaining 1T garlic and parsley; simmer until shrimp is heated through, about 1 minute.
Take off heat stir in 1T olive oil.
Cook pasta in salted water save 1/3 cup pasta water; drain.
In a pot add pasta 1/2 cup sauce (no shrimp) add 2-3T pasta water toss.
Put some pasta on plates top with sauce and shrimp.

To create a delicious Shrimp Fra Diavolo With Linguine, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
2. Add the shrimp and cook until they are pink and fully cooked through, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the red pepper flakes, crushed red pepper, and white wine. Cook until the liquid has reduced by half.
4. Add the linguine to the pot and toss to combine with the shrimp and sauce. Cook until the linguine is al dente.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the Shrimp Fra Diavolo With Linguine immediately, garnished with fresh parsley.

To cook delicious Easy Pumpkin Pancakes from scratch, follow these step-by-step instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients:
- 1 cup (200g) all-purpose flour
- 1 cup (200g) whole wheat flour
- 1 cup (200g) granulated sugar
- 1 cup (200g) brown sugar
- 1 cup (200g) unsalted butter, softened
- 1 egg
- 1/2 cup (120ml) milk
- 1/2 cup (120ml) pumpkin puree
- 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
- 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger
- 1/4 teaspoon ground cloves
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/4 cup (60ml) vanilla extract

3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the dry ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and cloves.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. The batter will be slightly lumpy.
5. Pour the batter onto a well-greased or non-stick skillet or griddle. Cook the pancakes over medium heat until bubbles appear on the surface and the edges start to curl. Flip the pancakes and cook for another minute or until the other side is golden brown.
6. Transfer the pancakes to a wire rack or plate to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Pumpkin Pancakes!

6f4d1ffc76.gt:
In la deep pot, bring water, a pinch of salt and oil to a boil.
Rinse rice a couple of times.
Add to boiling water.
Reduce heat to low, cover and cook until water evaporates (1520 minutes).
Fluff with fork, let it cool to room temperature or refrigerate until ready to use.
When ready to serve, add chopped cilantro and lime juice.
Season with salt.

2. Cook the rice: Once the rice is cooked, remove it from the heat and let it sit, covered, for about 5 minutes. Fluff the rice with a fork and set it aside.

3. Prepare the ingredients: In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.

4. Add the garlic and cook for a few seconds, until fragrant.

5. Add the cooked rice, cilantro, lime juice, and zest. Stir to combine all the ingredients.

6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

7. Serve: Cilantro Lime Rice can be served as a side dish or main course. It can be accompanied by various proteins, such as grilled chicken, fish, or beans.

In conclusion, to cook a delicious Cilantro Lime Rice, you will need to prepare the rice, cook it, prepare the ingredients, and then combine them to create a flavorful and satisfying dish.

6b1de00aa7.gt:
Boil rigatoni according to package directions.
While pasta is cooking, mix ricotta, egg, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and red pepper for the minicotti filling.
Season with salt.
You could add minced, sauteed mushrooms or chopped spinach here if you wish.
I season the filling a bit more than I would a normal manicotti; you want this one little bite to have some punch.
When rigatoni is al dente, drain and place pasta in cool water to stay soft while you work.
Place filling in an icing bag with a small tip, or a smaller plastic bag with a tiny corner nipped off will work just fine.
Pipe filling into rigatoni.
I like to fill the pasta halfway from one side and halfway from the other.
Place filled minicotti in a baking dish lightly sprayed with cooking spray.
Top minicotti lightly with pasta sauce.
Sprinkle lightly with Parmesan.
Bake at 350 F for 15-20 minutes.
Let sit at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving.
Enjoy!

Bake on a pizza stone or cookie sheet at 425 for 25 minutes.

Slice and serve hot with ice cold beers.

To prepare Raspberry Vinegar Chicken Breasts, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
3. In a small bowl, mix together 1/4 cup of raspberry vinegar, 1/4 cup of honey, and 1/4 cup of olive oil.
4. Dip the seasoned chicken breasts into the raspberry vinegar mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
5. Place the chicken breasts on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the chicken breasts in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken breasts from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them into thin pieces.
8. Serve the Raspberry Vinegar Chicken Breasts over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal!

[/INST]

[/SYS]

d1c38e95f4.gt:
Note: You will also need a Babycakes cake pop machine.
For the donuts: Preheat your Babycakes cake pop machine.
In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
Then add eggs, maple syrup, and vanilla.
Mix well.
Before adding apple pie filling, run a knife through the large chunks of apples to chop them into smaller pieces.
Then add to mixture and mix until all apples are incorporated.
Then add the milk.
The mixture will be on the thick side.
Pour 1 tablespoon of donut mixture into each reservoir of your preheated Babycakes cake pop machine.
Bake for 4 minutes, then remove and place on a plate or cooling rack to cool off.
For the glaze: In a small bowl mix together powdered sugar, vanilla, and milk.
You want the consistency to be runny, not thick.
Dip each donut in the mixture and flip it around by hand or with a fork until the whole donut is covered.
Then place back on the cooling rack until the glaze is dry.
For the coating: In a small bowl combine the powdered sugar and cinnamon.
Dip each donut into the mixture and roll around until all covered.
Then place finished donuts in an airtight container until ready to eat.
Oh, who are you kidding, go ahead and start eating!
d1c38e95f4.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add in cold butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Add in milk, one tablespoon at a time, until the dough comes together.
5. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.
6. Cut out circles of dough using a cookie cutter or a round object, such as a glass.
7. Place the dough circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the dough for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. While the dough is baking, prepare the filling. In a small bowl, mix together sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
10. Once the dough is cooked, let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Carefully press a small hole in the center of each dough circle using a spoon or a cookie press.
12. Dip each dough circle into the prepared filling, ensuring that the filling reaches the hole.
13. Place the dough circles back on the baking sheet and bake for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the filling is bubbly and the dough is golden brown.
14. Allow the donut holes to cool completely before enjoying.

[/INST]

Halve avocados and remove pit.
Roll limes or heat in microwave for 10 seconds to get juices flowing.
Halve the limes.
Rub the avocado halves gently with 1/2 lime to retard the browning.
Juice limes into small bowl and mix with sugar, chili powder and salt using a fork or small whisk.
Add extra-virgin olive oil in a slow stream while mixing dressing.
Pour dressing into the cavities of avocados, distributing it equally and serve.
Garnish with chives or cilantro as an optional garnish.

1. Wash and peel the avocados, then cut them in half lengthwise.
